title: Discount lost and re-applied
text: While migrating/upgrading from a 3-version older 1Password reference I lost the 50%-discount promotion that was offered in one of the upgrade stages. After contacting their support team this matter was handled after swift email conversation, and the discount was re-applied to my Family Plan subscription. 5-star for sure, and that includes their product and FAQ's available

title: Support Help is Great
text: I'm in the process of moving to 1Password from another manager and I've had several email conversations with their support team. I'm very impressed with the information and timeliness of their responses. That really helps me to make the change since I know I can rely on them for any help I may need.

title: the excellent and knowledgeable team
text: the excellent and knowledgeable team. a discount for new member moving to 1Password from another service. the help provided letting me know that the windows desktop app can help with the browser extension to keep it logged-in. everything was perfect! :)

title: Lots of suggestions for password retrieval/smooth process to start all over
text: I was unable to get into my account after I changed my password and somehow did not write it down correctly. Customer support really tried to help me retrieving it, giving me a whole list of things to try. Unfortunately none worked and I had to start all over again with a new account but they made it as smooth and easy as it could be. I was also reminded to download the Emergency Kit right away, which I did.

title: V happy so far
text: I've been using 1password for about a week after another lastpass breach made me shop around. It's great so far, everything l need in an integrated password manager, it just stays in the background until I need it. Shared vault means we're not losing the ikea password between family members! Best bit is I got a discount code through work that required me to start a new account; quick chat with the admin team and they applied the discount - v happy :)

title: 1Password support email
text: I received an email from 1Password that was concise and explained the problem clearly.  Based on the info provided, I knew how to resolve the issue.  I updated my information easily and let the support team know that I had made changes to my account info.  The support team responded quickly to let me know that the issue was now resolved.

title: Customer Support Representative Wahid H‚Ä¶
text: Customer Support Representative Wahid H assisted me through converting my 1Password vault database to a new computer and from 1PW4 to 1PW7 without any loss of data. His support was very thorough and responses to my questions were very quick. The 1Password product is easy to use, very secure, and the Customer Support is excellent.

title: I was able to resolve the issue quickly.
text: My task was to transfer from a SourceNext account to a Faplan subscription. They responded quickly and courteously and helped me to resolve the issue without any loss of account data. I am very satisfied. 1Password has become an indispensable tool in our daily life.

title: INCREDIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE AND SUPPORT
text: Since my faith in LastPass has completely disappeared, I was looking for a new password manager alternative and decided to try 1Password. As a new customer, I felt lost and frustrated because I had messed something up with my account. Yasmina from 1Password was incredibly helpful with both my billing AND technical issues. Now that I'm up and running; looking forward to sharing my experience with family friends an coworkers!

title: I dislike the 'no in person, phone support' policy‚Ä¶
text: I like the quick email reply to my request for help.  But I dislike the 'no in person, phone support' policy. My issue could have been solved with a 10 minute phone call.  Instead, the issue took several email back and forths plus about 30 minutes of my time following the email guidance, which failed the first few attempts.

title: Very happy with 1Password.
text: Very happy with 1Password. As a former Lastpass user, I must say that 1Password is so much better and user-friendly with nicer features and UI. Also great support that actually replies back to me.

title: Good customer support
text: Upgrading subscription with iPhone was not possible due to Apple's restriction. Customer support was very clear and helpful with the process. I got the upgrade done easily with their support.

title: 1Password is great!
text: I‚Äôve always been a fan but was reluctant deal with leaving Lastpass. The latest breach made the decision easy for me and I‚Äôve been so impressed with the whole experience.  I have an account through Eero Plus and I‚Äôm thrilled that 1Password is letting me add a 6th family member for no additional cost. Overall the customer service experience has been great.

title: Love 1Password
text: Love 1Password! Getting the security and usability combination right is tough, but I think 1Password does it well. They get it. I work in the IT industry and if you have to use a centralized password manager service, 1Password has to be it. Apps looks super sleek and nice, and are easy to use. If that's not enough, I had to work through an issue via their customer support (it was an issue of my own doing :) ) and they were incredibly helpful. Can't recommend them enough!

title: After 1 year usage
text: After 1 year usage, I was considering to change from 1password, but the very kind support convinced me with an extra discount to stay and enjoy further the password manager services. I could not resist and I stayed :) 10/10 Support Experience.

title: Changing account email from work to personal
text: i like the product to begin with, and fortunately, my situation where I had to change my account email from work to personal was an easy fix. Worried it would be more complex, it seems that must be something that often happens since it was a simple procedure with well laid out instructions.

title: Amazing support team
text: The 1Password support team are brilliant! They are all very quick to respond on Twitter and over email. The guidance provided for my query was easy to follow and set up. I'm a very happy customer - thanks again to the 1Password team!

title: Best customer service ever!
text: Never do complex things with a migraine! I changed my password with a migraine and lost the password. Fortunately I was still logged into original account so I was able to find the instructions on how to copy all of my vault information into my new account that I set up. But I was afraid I was going to have to pay again for the new account. I contacted customer service, and Marcus was fantastic in helping me complete the process and credit the money from my original account to my new account. He even enabled me to delete the original account. I am so impressed with the customer service that Marcus provided. His emails were clear and caring. I already loved 1password but now I love it even more that I have experienced your fantastic Customer Service! Highly recommend  1password.

title: It offers good features to create‚Ä¶
text: It offers good features to create secure passwords. It's also available for Android and Chrome with an extension, which makes things easier. In Android, sometimes it doesn't show the 1Password option to enter the password in some websites/apps, so it's a bit annoying have to switch to the app to search for the password.

title: Indispensable piece of SW
text: Indispensable piece of SW on my Mac, iPhone and iPad. Very stable and reliable, as is the support. Responsive, fast and accurate. Best of it, if there are problems, which happens, sind his is openly communicated. Very trustworthy!

title: Fast and Helpful Support
text: The support team quickly reached out to me when I raised a billing-related query. The team provided me with multiple steps and options, which helped in resolving the issue quickly

title: One of the quickest support teams!
text: One of the quickest support teams! Migrating process from another password manager is nicely done with guidance emails at the right times - and the support team has solved inquiries regarding billing within the same day. Besides, the whole ecosystem of 1password seems promising, while keeping a clean interface and a nice feature for splitting passwords up in multiple vaults.

title: Great customer service
text: Great customer service. Quick response, knowledgeable, provided alternatives, and ultimately solved the issue.  Will now focus on using the technology and the tools, but first experience with the company was great.

title: 1password customer support is helpful, with delay
text: 1password customer support is responsive and knowledgeable. Their answers are to the point, well written. THe only reason i gave them 4 instead of 5 stars is that it always takes 24 to 48 hours for a reply, so if you are in a bind (I was) they cannot take you out of it quickly.

title: 1Password was awesome
text: 1Password‚Äôs whole team I dealt with were knowledgeable and very able resolve the problem I had very quickly. Other IT customer support teams should take a leaf out of their book,

title: Great customer service experience
text: Great customer service experience. I needed to delete an old stale account and transfer licences to a new one, and the 1Password team we're super-helpful in guiding me through the process, and explaining the reasons for each step along the way. This included contacting and validating my "old" email address to prevent hijacking/takeover, so as a benefit I am now familiar and confident with their processes to protect my identity and privacy. The 1Password tech seems solid, and it's comforting to know that the support process is also solid, and is fronted by knowledgeable staff.

title: The new browser addon is annoying
text: The new browser addon is annoying.  It takes up way to much space.  The old one was much better and less intrusive.

title: I'm happy with the help I've received‚Ä¶
text: I'm happy with the help I've received in setting up my 1Password individual account. I had assistance from Pierre and Darcy - thank you - and they were very nice and know what they are doing. I am almost 80 years old and have to often depend on the knowledge of young people who grew up chewing on computer cords!

title: Great customer support
text: I had problems logging in to my account on the app and contacted suport for help, i got a reply much faster than i expected and they were very helpful, the issue was quickly and easily solved.

title: Quick and painless
text: I'm surprised that I didn't have to go back and forth a million times to get my problem resolved. Once your crew properly identified me, you all gave me my refund, and I went on with my day!

title: Team-Work in action.
text: Had a question about modifying the 1password billing-cycle. The 1Password-Team handily managed the request, keeping me updated with options. And the eventual execution of the decision I selected.  Great Job, thanks.

title: Great product and customer service
text: Customer service is highly responsive and was very helpful. After the egregious breach of trust of LastPass, 1Password is a fantastic alternative and couldn‚Äôt be happier with the service.

title: Best Support Team Ever!
text: I had made an error in setting up my account, creating a family instead of an individual acct. Support was fantastic, responding quickly and guiding me step-by-step to get everything working the way I wanted. I am one of many changing my Last Pass and grade that I have. 1Password is easy to organize and clean up duplicates. Again, support is the best I have experienced.

title: One of the Best Support Teams I have Experienced
text: The support team members who handled my problem used a friendly tone in their emails. The message was consistent even if it was not the same person who replied to my many emails. The team was courteous, patient and the instructions were concise and not hard to follow.  The responses from the team were prompt. I felt like I was talking to someone I knew! Thanks Team.

title: double subscription
text: I mistakenly had signed a double subscription. One for a .COM domain, the other for a EUROPEAN one. Therefore, I was billed twice although I only use one domain.  I asked for help and the problem was found instantly and I was refunded my second payment. Super. Thanx. / Dankesch√∂n

title: Smooth migration from LastPass
text: After 9 years with LastPass I couldn't ignore their security issues anymore and decided to switch to 1password. I wasn't looking forward to the transition as l compared both in February last year and still preferred LastPass back then but was very pleasantly surprised with their new product and improvements made over the year (especially in the UX department). Their customer support was also very accommodating and helped smooth out the transition. Recommended.

title: Simply great professionalism
text: Simply great professionalism, accurate, fast answer with their support department. A free bug software does not exist, what makes the difference is on how do the supplier react when you are getting a problem or ask for some help in configuration.  They are simply amazing !

title: Invoice enquiry
text: While my support need was quite simple; a billing enquiry that I only needed to make because I didn‚Äôt update my new card details in time. Once I updated though, and maybe because I was overdue at that point, it wasn‚Äôt Immediately obvious that the current invoice was actually paid. The support result was timely (even on a Saturday!) and delivered in a professional manner by one of your champions, Zach. He informed me that the bill was indeed paid and that the invoice was generating. Great product, great experience and only necessary because I noobed it. Would give a sixth star.

title: Great
text: Zoe B. and Kristen B. were very responsive to my request for a discount, I switched to 1Password from LastPass. They responded to me quickly and not only addressed my inquiry, however also provided additional information and resource links. I appreciate my positive support experience as a new customer. Great job!

title: I got supported by Chris G
text: I got supported by Chris G. Very glad for his assistance. Fast, accurate, very kind and helpful! It was great experience and I it was thanks to him! He definitely deserve a raise or at least a bonus!

title: Quick Customer Support Response
text: I recently submitted a billing question to 1Password, and was impressed by the quick response. I wanted to take advantage of a discount I missed when I signed up. Within minutes of my request, an agent resolved the issue. I couldn‚Äôt have asked for a faster response and resolution to my question.

title: Resigning Up
text: Had a few questions to help get my account back up and running and over the course of a few days multiple people helped me. The issues was resolved very quickly and everyone was super friendly

title: The 1Password support team has helped‚Ä¶
text: The 1Password support team has helped me solve the subscription problem which bothers me a lot. They responded to my email very quickly and provided assistance so patiently. Thank you so much.

title: Super Fast Response
text: Super Fast Response and sorted my problem with the first email. Got me out of a massive hole - thanks!

title: Zahra made it sparkle.
text: Zahra replied in a timely manner with the most perfect and flawless of communications every expressed in the age of humanity. Stormy clouds outside my house cleared, birds sang, and sparkles twinkled in the air. My day was perfect after that.

title: Great customer service and support
text: Reached out with an issue that was entirely caused by my own actions, looking for support on an account that was deleted. Received a quick response, and was able to have my access restored within a few days. Every member of the support team was extremely helpful and friendly, and even restored a subscription with additional months added as a bonus.

title: Unexpectedly comprehensive advice
text: Unexpectedly comprehensive advice, going beyond the questions I'd asked.  And not only that but they gave a huge subscription discount which I had not noticed I was entitled to.  Impressed.

title: Always a learning curve
text: There was always a learning curve with 1Password, and it‚Äôs always been cumbersome to use on a mobile device. Still, it‚Äôs continued to be the most recommended app for security. The app has been changing lately, requiring more learning to figure out what‚Äôs up. Some features are good, like allowing one to click on login information when that information is stored in 1Password. Others are annoying, like aggressively asking if I want to save information even if the site has nothing to do with a login and sometimes, in doing so, putting up a banner that hides information I need to see. So it seems to be (and I hope) a work in progress.

title: Excellent responsiveness and customer focus
text: I recently sent an email inquiry to address an account access problem I was having. The responsiveness of the support team was much appreciated. After a couple of clarifying questions they immediately provided me the answers I needed.

title: IPassword customer support
text: We had a self-inflicted problem with my sister-in-law's account. I contacted 1Password support on her behalf late on New Year's Eve. Quite understandably, we promptly received an automated reply which was informative and helpful but did not refer to our specific problem. With no further prompting, Darcy, from 1PW support, made contact immediately after the holiday period saying he would contact my sister-in-law direct. He did so and dealt with the issue promptly, efficiently and courteously. My sister-in-law's account is now closed and we will integrate her within our 'Families' account. Excellent and friendly customer support. Much appreciated.

title: Had an problem with a discount code
text: Had an problem with a discount code on subscription not applying and they were quick to reply my email and resolve the issue. App seems to work well so far. Switching from last pass due to their data breach handling and some browser integration issues with Opera.

title: Great communication and for different‚Ä¶
text: Great communication and for different team members to work case and timely was great.  Great support experience!

title: Transition to 1Password Help
text: I'm new to 1Password, as well as to your web browser vs app. When I had questions, the team always responded on the same day, with the right answers! Transitioning all of my passwords for 15 years, and upgrading them, is painful at best. Your support was highly appreciated.

title: Subscription Help
text: Had trouble activating a subscription discount and the customer service folks were very helpful, via email, in getting the issue resolved.  Happy I switched to 1Password.

title: Ex-LastPass user seeking for alternative
text: Having used LastPass for nine years, I decided it was time to use a different password manager. After all security issues with LastPass, I simply didn‚Äôt trust them anymore. Transition to 1Password went smoothly and the interface is state of the art. Good decision!

title: Excellent support
text: Excellent support. My case was unusual, requiring some research. The support I received was prompt and the fix worked!  It was all by email, and worked fine. The technicians were very polite and professional. I‚Äôm quite satisfied.

title: Very responsive
text: Very responsive. Support staff knew the issue and provided clear, easy directions to deactivate my apple subscription and convert from individual to a family account. I dumped Last Pass and am loving 1P

title: Very good support to help me transfer‚Ä¶
text: Very good support to help me transfer to a family plan, from an Apple trial subscription.

title: Top notch customer service from Laura and other members of the support team
text: Laura and other members of the support team were able to answer my questions quickly and effectively. They also provided me some support as a new customer which definitely made me feel some immediate loyalty. And they always checked in to see if there was more they could help with. Top notch customer service!! Thanks

title: Great customer service and great‚Ä¶
text: Great customer service and great password manger. Migrate from LastPass and no regrets. More security options and password vault is actually fully encrypted.

title: The whole team that helped me was‚Ä¶
text: The whole team that helped me was awesome!! Knowledgeable, easy to work with, clear communication. Just a great experience!

title: Avoid upgrading to 1Password 8
text: The latest version of the Chrome extension is worse than previous versions. It often doesn't appear, breaks the browsers autofill for addresses and credit cards, and always offers to save a bunch of unnecessary info when creating a new account. If you‚Äôre on 1Password 7, stay there!

title: Very helpful and responsive team
text: Very helpful and responsive team. When I've encountered a technical issue, they've been very responsive in either helping me resolve it, or implementing a fix. 1password is also well ahead of the game with it's service.

title: Fantastic Product
text: I used to use LastPass which was becoming more and more unusable and clunky. Very few sites would autofill at all and I was not getting any more benefit other than a secure vault. But then Lastpass got hacked and I moved to 1Password. I wish I had done it before! 1Password is slick, works perfectly on all of my platforms and seamlessly autofills. An added layer of security is that your data is encrypted with a key that is only stored on your devices, 1password has no copy of it, so even if they are breached, your data is safe. The product is great and I totally recommend it.

title: This password manager is highly recommended.
text: It's easy to understand why 1Password is so widely praised as the best password manager out there. I've been with 1Password for years, in-fact after nine years of using it, I can personally attest to its reliability and convenience. For me personally, this tool has been amazing. I have passwords for dozens of online accounts, each with different lengths and characters, (most are over 25 characters with numbers and symbols thrown in) and 1Password makes managing them a breeze. With a single click, it fills in forms and remembers my credentials, so I don't have to. It also offers top-notch security features, such as regional lockout and two-factor authentication, so I can rest assured that my data is safe. On top of that, 1Password is incredibly user-friendly. I can audit my credentials easily and weed out duplicate login info and remove sites I don't use. I can quickly generate strong passwords and store them in an encrypted database. Plus, the intuitive setup makes it easy to get started. In short, 1Password is an indispensable tool for anyone who wants to keep their online accounts safe. Whether you're setting up your accounts for the first time or have dozens of logins to manage, 1Password is the perfect solution. No more stress and worry about security, just get it and forget about it. I highly recommend 1Password and will continue to be a loyal customer for the 10th year and beyond.

title: No customer support and broken app
text: No customer support and a very much broken app  1, password 8 for Android flat out doesn't work it doesn't support autofill and it's doesn't sync with other devices however even though I have opened a ticket with 1 password support they won't respond I have made more than 1 attempt to fallow up however they continue to refuse to respond to when I post publicly they tell me to open a ticket however I have an open ticket they refuse to respond to

title: Great when it works BUT . . .
text: When it works, it‚Äôs great, but there‚Äôs a lot not to love about 1Password, and it‚Äôs hard to get support except in small bites separated by the length of their shifts (e.g. every 12-15 hours or so). It‚Äôs also been impossible for me to figure out how to get it to autofill with Android phone and tablet. (Yes there are steps to follow but they haven‚Äôt made any difference.) And now somehow the setting that has helped me avoid having to login every time I want a password filled in has died, and I dread the 2-3 day slog I‚Äôll have to go through to fix it.

title: Timely and helpful service
text: They got back to me in just a few hours with the correct solution, then followed up to make sure my issue was resolved. I was very pleased with the service.

title: rapid response
text: rapid response, calm professional approach, excellent clear explanations and instructions from all the Support team members I interacted with, and together we solved my problem AND a generous three-year free subscription ‚Äî happy chappie, thank you!

title: The 1Password set up challenges
text: 1Password can be confusing unless you're up to following the instructions in every regard, which can be frustrating for some of us.  I've found that if you articulate your issue to the support staff, they will promptly contact you and follow up with considerable patience to help overcome your challenges.

title: Working with the 1Password team on an‚Ä¶
text: Working with the 1Password team on an issue was a true pleasure. There were several who helped me and each one was kind, respectful, and quickly fixed the issue. Not only were they quick and respectful, they had the knowledge to help and the ability to explain clearly so I understood what I could do on my end. Actually one of the best experiences I have ever had with any customer service department.  Truly!

title: Quick and easy
text: Quick and easy.  I stated my problem and they were able to resolve it without a lot of back and fourth.  Top quality service

title: Top level customer service.
text: Using 1Password over the years I have needed Customer Service at various times, from the simple to the complicated, and customer service has always come through to guide me toward the solution.  Late night on a Sunday in a panic, Customer Service was there, Holiday time at the end of the year, Customer Service was there.  Top notch.  They have a customer for life.

title: Great customer service.
text: Great customer service with a quick responce.   Very helpful and I got my issure resolved quickly.

title: Quickly Issued my Refund
text: They were able to quickly issue a pro-rated refund of my family plan after I attached my account to my business account only 4 days after I had paid for my family plan account.

title: Easy and fast support when switching to 1Password families
text: I had issues switching from the 1Password Individual plan to the Families plan. I reached out to the 1Password support team, and after a few back-and-forth mails, my issue was addressed, and the switch was complete. I am a long time user of the 1Password and will be onboarding my family members to protect their passwords.

title: Thanks for solving my payment query‚Ä¶
text: Thanks for solving my payment query quickly, I should have reached out to you earlier. India regulations have made it harder to pay by card online. Your suggestion to pay via App Store was the fastest remedy.

title: Amazing support
text: Amazing support! Quick, professional and friendly responses - and excellent result!

title: I was having trouble using 1Password with Firefox
text: I was having trouble using 1Password on my laptop with Firefox. I contacted customer support and they quickly got back to me. Paul sent me a detailed response with several remedies to try. It was so carefully thought out I was able to fix my issue without contacting them further. From someone who‚Äôs not the most tech savvy, that‚Äôs saying something. Very professional service; very helpful advice!

title: Very fast response time ...
text: Very fast response time on my initial inquiry AND on the subsequent clarifications. Clear and very friendly communication, with a quick and easy solution to my problem. Very happy switching to 1Password.

title: Y‚Äôall have been great
text: Y‚Äôall have been great. This is top notch customer service, really. I manage a team of medical device field service engineers over half the US after being one myself for about 20 years. I have been on the inside of customer service and technical support for decades. I say that simply to give perspective that I know what I‚Äôm talking about when comparing good and bad customer experience. This has been a pleasure and you‚Äôve won back a customer.

title: Excellent and fast support service
text: After upgrading from 1Password 7 to 1Password 8 I realized that my 1Password cloud account was created in 1Password.com. For me it was important to have my data hosted in EU. The support staff was responding very fast and personal shortly after Christmas public holidays on transferring my 3 year 50% discount without any discussion to my new 1Password.eu account. Flawless and very friendly experience. If you have a problem just get in touch with the support team.

title: Talked me off the cliff
text: I recently decided to move up to ver 8 from 6.8.9 but managed to completely pooch the process by creating multiple accounts using multiple email addresses. I had created such a mess that I started to think there was no way out and started looking at other password managers out there. Catherine F. in 1P Support managed to very patiently and persistently talk me off the cliff and worked with me all the way to the end to get me up and running on ver 8. I can‚Äôt say enough how happy I am with the support at 1P. Sincerely a very happy camper, Dana H.

title: Reliable and responsive support on a‚Ä¶
text: Reliable and responsive support on a billing question. Good followup and everyone was on the same page.

title: Thank you for your amazing help!
text: Everyone was really helpful and answered my questions fully and really quickly (even though it was near the holidays). I am really grateful to everyone's kind help.

title: Quick and kind help
text: Quick response and very clear and easy next steps on how to downgrade my account. I felt like I was talking to a human who really cared about helping me fix my issue, and they went above and beyond to get me credited for the money I‚Äôd already spent.

title: 1Password has good support by email
text: When I was setting up my new 1Password account, the email support person quickly let me know that I had created a duplicate account by mistake, and was able to remove it for me.  So far, 1Password support seems to be very responsive and helpful.

title: 1Password for Good!
text: The representatives at 1Password were able to help me keep my account active and keep all of my accounts and documents safe. After reaching out with an attempt to sign up for 1Password for Democracy, they explained the requirements and offered an alternative option.

title: It was an awesome experience to work‚Ä¶
text: It was an awesome experience to work with 1password support and especially with your agents Elijah, Rob, Kaley, and Michelle! They understand the problem from the beginning clearly and helped me in the shortest period of time with excellent answers to my problem. Thank you for your wonderful service! Best regards, Dmytro

title: I am a registered client and am trying‚Ä¶
text: I am a registered client and am trying to move my account from Android to IOS after being hacked on Google and facebook. But the app keeps trying to give the free startup and I cannot sign in to iOS or access my subscriptions  Regards Laurence Welsh

title: 1Password, excellent people and manager
text: 1Password team is really helpful from the very beggining, even before made an account. The manager itself has so many capabilities and its certainly very friendly for the average user. Keep up the good work!

title: I always download updates; too complicated
text: I always download updates, esp. for newest security improvements.  So when 1Password v.8 came, I downloaded it.  As often happens with updates, some things stopped working.  Like the open and fill.  I contacted service via email. It took 6 exchanges over 7 days to fix it.  Lots of computer lingo went way over my head.  The last one simply said, download 1Password for Safari, gave me the link.  That did it.  Glad to have it fixed, but took too long.   And do not approach the general public with computer lingo or expected expertise.

title: Friendly, responsive customer service
text: As a new 1Password user, I had a question about billing and sent off an email to customer support on Boxing Day. It wasn't urgent and it was still the holidays so I wasn't expecting the response that came later that day! Question answered and they made sure I was set up and ready to go. Thank you 1Password support.

title: Support was attentive and responsive‚Ä¶
text: Support was attentive and responsive and knew the exact answer I needed!

title: Awesome response time and support
text: The response time was quick and the support team was very kind. They always looked for the best way find a solution, and for helping of course!

title: Very helpful
text: Very helpful with moving over to 1Password from another company that has had issues. Helpdesk have shown the process through. Very impressed

title: Friendly and responsive customer support
text: Friendly and responsive customer support. Helped me out with a new user discount, that I have not applied correctly while signing up for the service.

title: Painless Troubleshooting.
text: Troubleshooting advice was very complete and efficient. Several options were offered depending on my preference. Everyone involved was courteous, friendly and professional.

title: Prompt and fast response
text: Prompt response that answered my question thoroughly and completely. Kudos.

title: Power users should avoid - your favorite features are temporary and will be removed next.
text: I don‚Äôt mind the change to Electron. I don‚Äôt mind the change to a subscription model - I actually appreciate this if it allows companies to fund further development without accepting VC dollars and chasing infinite growth. I do mind that with every major release there is a retraction of features. Of the ability to segment credentials into individual vaults and select which vaults are active. I do mind the constant spurring of longtime users and power users. "Collections" and having to fundamentally re-create my 8-year-plus-old vault organization is not an equitable feature.

title: Issues with passwords cause‚Ä¶
text: Issues with passwords cause overwhelming stress.  The team at 1Password did an outstanding job of understanding my unique circumstances and then suggested a course of action to resolve it.  Better yet, the provided step by step suggestions and where there to help.  This approach put me at ease and gave me confidence that the solution would work.  Simple, clear instructions with answers to every question.  That is how you eliminate stress on password issues.  Way to go 1Password team!

title: Great customer support
text: Emailed customer support with an issue I was having and they quickly resolved it. Very good support.

title: Outstanding tech support from 1Password
text: It is not often that I deal with excellent customer service these days but I was amazed and delighted at the response from the support team at 1Password when I had an installation problem.  Not only did I receive a response within 24 hours (and this was during the Christmas holiday season) but the response directly addressed my issue and provided a number of helpful suggestions. There was no copy and paste of standard wording or simply links to preformatted text. The support technician (Pierre) wrote a personal reponse and invited me to contact them again if I needed further help. Outstanding service!  Thank you Pierre and 1Password!  I am very happy to commend your service.

title: Great Password Manager/Customer Support from a Former LastPass User
text: I have been a LastPass user for many years however due to their recent string of security issues and inadequate public response to its customers, I started looking at other services. I have known about 1Password for years and it consistently received favorable reviews so I gave it a try. I also reviewed two other highly rated password managers. The export from Lastpass was seamless and correctly tagged my Login items. I am still learning how to make good use of the other features. So far so good. I saw the available promotions from the review sites but was not sure if they were available to me when I downloaded the install file. So I reached out to 1Password customer support. Zoe B. replied within a very short time (New Year's Day) and said she would followup on my request. She did and within a coupe of days I received confirmation that I would receive the promotion from Kristen B. in customer support. What I am impressed about is the quick turnaround response to my request. That makes a difference. Thank you Zoe and Kristen from customer support! Very much appreciated!

title: IPassword for Safari
text: The instructions for using IPassword for Safari are confusing‚Äîthe question is whether to keep both 1Password for Safari and IPassword app enabled in Safari settings>extensions. Here is the instruction I received via email:  "You should have received two 1Password "apps". One titled 1Password, this is the Mac app and what you'll want to keep, the other will be titled " 1Password for Safari ". This latter you can click on and follow the steps to enabled 1Password for Safari. Once this is complete you can move this icon elsewhere as it's purpose is to set up Safari. From there it will only open Safari for you and if you already have Safari pinned to your Dock or desktop there's no reason to have both.‚Äù Now I have downloaded !Password 8, and I enabled 1Password for Safari, but I no longer see 1Password in the Safari extensions. Am I missing something? I received a reply from 1Password, advising me to quit Safari and go to 1Password>Help>Fix Missing Extension, but I think that they misunderstood my question and did not clarify the explanation from 1Password that was provided above. I do have the 1Password for Safari installed, but in the prior version of 1Password, I saw two extensions in the Safari settings: 1Password and 1Password for Safari. I now see only the latter, which I have enabled. I don't know whether this is a problem. The extension seems to be working.

title: Downgraded over and over again
text: I started using 1Pw in 2014‚Äîwith the most expensive plan available, ‚Äúpay once, use it forever‚Äù.  Do I like 1Password? Yes, I had a great experience with 1Pw for years and my passwords ‚Äúsurvived‚Äù many intruders and scandals, be it on Tumblr, Twitter‚Ä¶.  What I don‚Äôt like: However, more recently, I had to realize that features were removed, limits and thresholds tightened, restrictions of usage applied, and so forth. So, basically my license was downgraded over and over again. Cannot even edit existing passwords on my desktop anymore. Cannot add new photos/files, devices‚Ä¶ Doesn't feel like a ‚Äúthank you‚Äù for early customers/adopters

title: The most frustrating Password experience ever.
text: BAD & FRUSTRATING. I would rather spend 3x the $$ than waste 3X the amount of time trying to help 1Password 7 & 1Password 8 work. 80% of the time it never finds my password, saves a password or makes a suggestion to save changes. The anger and frustration involved in 2 years are beyond frustrating. I don't want my money back. I want 1Password to work at least 50% of the time and not 10%. I can express that using your Apple password saver is 100x easier. How can 1PW be safer when I waste time fixing and correcting knowing that the next I will have the same problem, The redundant answers from tech support are even more frustrating. So why bother with more frustration? Using the website plugin and everything offered is a bad experience compared to 1PW offer.

title: Good so far - moving from LastPass
text: I felt upon looking at alternatives and needing to leave Lastpass (due to their recent security issues) that this was the best alternative including the ease of use, transition to the software, and integration across multiple platforms that I was looking to get.  I feel good about the software so far; it was easy to transfer to and set up. I have successfully changed over a dozen passwords and it is intuitive and simple to use, just as LastPass was.  I'm still on the trial, only 1 day in, so I may find things pro & con in the future.   I did find one issue: I found an iPad bug that crashes it (iPadOS 16.1.1) when you use the watchtower.  There is a workaround and they are aware of the issue, but I took a star away because after searching for a solution I found it's been out there for 3 months so far without a fix yet.  (That may seem harsh on my part, but I've only used it for 1 day and found an issue that crashes the software).   I'm also looking for a clear description of where the database resides (that was the issue with LastPass - the databases were hacked and stolen) and I'd prefer to self-manage that aspect.   I am hoping they quickly resolve the bug and my understanding, and if I find nothing else I'd promote to 5 stars. I'd cautiously say so far, so good!

title: 1Password License to Membership Migration
text: I recently decided to move from 1Passport version 7 to version 8.  Over the course of about month I queried the support folks with numerous questions to help me make this decision and always received a helpful response.  When I finally made the decision to move to version 8 I had a thread of 23 separate inquiries to the support group.  They were very patient.  I would have rated the experience as a 5, but I did struggle some following the online migration instructions and the support team response to some of my questions about the instructions.  Another possible opportunity for improvement would be to assign a case to one team member.  I probably communicated with a half dozen different support team members within the 23 email thread.  Finally, even though email is a great tool, I think a phone call, particularly during the migration process would have saved time and frustration.  I've only had version 8 for a day, so I can't comment yet on whether this has been a good decision, but I am delighted with now being able to open my vault with a touch of my finger.  Thanks to all the support team members that helped me along!

title: 1Password is my password manager for life
text: I have been using 1Password for about a decade and the software, security and customer service have never failed me. Every time I reach out to 1Password either for a tech issue or a billing question, they are on the spot with a response and a helpful resolution. This last time I reached out asking about why I incurred a foreign transaction fee on my credit card for my annual family subscription. Not only did they help with the matter they even gave me a $5.00 credit until I figure out a better credit card to use for my annual billing. They are in Canada and I live in the USA. I began using their software for my Mac and paid for the software upfront. I then began using the App on my iPhone and iPad and paid for those initial installations. Eventually, I went to the Family subscription plan and I have not regretted the decision. The only suggestion I would like to make is to make it possible to sync with my iCloud account alongside of syncing onto 1Password's encrypted servers. At the present, I use 1Password 7 on my iOS devices for that reason and use 1Password 8 on my Mac OS devices--MacBook Pro and MacStudio. I plan to stay with 1Password for as long as I can envision, even as I begin incorporating Passkeys into my online security. Having a double layer of Passkeys baked into my keychain as well as 1Password security on their servers is the best kind of protection going forward. Thanks 1Password for your vigilant attention to security and for the best kind of customer service out there--the kind that answers email almost immediately and resolves the problems or questions with specific attention. Thanks 1Password. You have gained a customer for life!

title: Used to be great, keeps getting worse.
text: Used to be great, has gotten progressively worse over time.  Successive updates have removed features, some large (like local vaults), some small.  On Mac, I've had to reinstall the app twice in the past week after updates render it "unable to be opened". The new JavaScript-only browser extension now takes ~20 seconds to unlock every time I'm asked for my master password; the classic extension which communicated with the desktop app was instant. It used to be a native macOS app, and felt like one. Now feels like any other website pretending to be an app, but at least all the platforms are now at parity. To be fair, this change is an upgrade for those who mostly use the app on Windows, but it's a shame we had to lose one of the better native Mac apps in the name of easier cross-platform support.  I'll still use 1Password, but I miss the days when it was a solid recommendation to pretty much everyone I knew.

title: Extremely fast support; generous & kind
text: Fast, efficient service was rather unexpected from a password manager. Most of the ones I've used are pretty slow & you hardly ever talk to a real person. For a pretty minor amount for all the security we gain,  1Password's support was excellent. We recently subscribed to 1Password on a Black Friday discount of -25%. We were still in the 14-day trial period, but thought to go ahead & lock in the pricing by adding our billing information. Then, we stumbled onto a much better deal (-50% off), but only for new customers. Alina at 1Password got us sorted out extremely quickly, within the business day: we were upgraded to the 50% discount, even though we were technically "old / new" customers (new customers still in the trial period). She also gently explained how ordinary Family  Members can be upgraded to Family Organizers, so that we can recover accounts or manage billing changes like this one. Super fast, super kind. The best kind of support!

title: The Clear Choice When Browser Auto-Fill Doesn't Suffice
text: I have been using 1Password for five years and have been loving it ever since. It's a password manager, a 2FA code generator, a document vault, a secret filler, and much more. Compared to other password managers, 1Password is wonderfully integrated into all Apple platforms and even available on Linux, Windows, and the Web. It also is very transparent about its internal processes with whitepapers available on the encryption schemes and clear server regions (GDPR compliant, regularly audited etc.) The 1Password team is passionate about their work and absolutely friendly in the rare cases where one might need help. If you're looking for something that does more than your browser auto-fill, then 1Password is definitely the way to go.

text: If you‚Äôre a computer guru then you‚Äôll be fine with their support. If you‚Äôre like the rest of us you‚Äôll be left high and dry to try to figure out how to navigate this increasingly complex app. I‚Äôm reasonable fascile with computers and apps yet when I have a problem with 1PW I‚Äôm stuck.  They will only offer email help and it‚Äôs been a nightmare for me. That is a difficult way for me to receive information. I need to talk with someone. I‚Äôve been with them a long time and appreciate the integrations they‚Äôve developed, but when there‚Äôs a problem it‚Äôs not easy and they leave you out in the cold.

title: The workers at 1Password  company merged‚Ä¶
text: My original internet company merged with someone else. Since then I had problems with 1Password getting in. We went back and forth for a couple weeks between me, the new company and your workers at 1Password. Finally the company had to put in a new line for computer, then I was still having a problem. I was all set to delete 1Password and start over. Then one final last try did the trick. I couldn‚Äôt believe it. Your workers are geniuses and need a raise in pay!!!!!!!!!! They stood by me and never gave up and their efforts came through. They are wonderful. I want to thank them so much for all the efforts and patience. I can‚Äôt praise them enough. Florence Pennington

title: Your team responses get an "A" for‚Ä¶
text: Your team responses get an "A" for responsiveness but only a "B" for content. Switching responders does not work well, as the new responder does not necessarily read the case history adequately. As a result, the responses were sometimes less useful.

title: Very helpful customer support helped me‚Ä¶
text: Very helpful customer support helped me when I lost access to my data.

title: 1Password has one of the best support teams out there.
text: Every time I've interacted with 1Password's support, it's felt like someone was actually listening to me and not just glossing over what I was asking like I've had with many other software support teams. Any questions or issues I've had have been dealt with efficiently; it's genuinely felt like they had a vested interest in helping me and finding a solution. I even spent a little time reading their blog, and I really liked how clear and honest they are about the challenges they have, why 1Password has or doesn't have the features it does, and what's coming. I can count on one hand the number of times I've felt this vibe from a company - please please never lose this!

title: Quick response and the issue was‚Ä¶

title: I was a big fan of Password 7
text: I was a big fan of Password 7; Password 8, not so much.  I am constantly being asked to input my password when Password 7 would take a facial ID or fingerprint.  I wouldn't mind if it were a four number code, but that would never do with the new program.  I just seem to have to do more work to get the same result.  I can't even submit this review without typing in my entire email address -- which, of course, I have in 1Password but cannot access from this box!

title: Great: Software, Support | Problems: Autofill (Login data) only on Android
text: First of all hello. I've had 1password for exactly a year now, and the only reason I got it was because my passwords were stolen from my Google account.  Pros: Since the day I subscribed to it, and that's pretty good money for a private person like me, I haven't had a single problem, either logging in or registering, and not a single password has been stolen.  The software on Windows is excellent with no bugs. It serves its purpose wonderfully, and so far I have not found a single difficulty.  The support service is unparalleled, especially the chat feature, which I appreciate so much with companies as it makes it easy to get a quick response. I thank the staff from the bottom of my heart. Cons: It's a different story on Android, but I don't work with the phone much. The autofill function sometimes works to not at all. This only happened when I did the new (big) update.  Conclusion: I recommend anyone who values their accounts and is on the internet a lot, opens a lot of accounts, to buy 1password. It is definitely worth it! Greetings from Austria ~M.H EDIT: I found a solution how you can solve the auto-fill problem on your Android phone. You have to delete the data and the cache of the app and then reinstall it. Then it should work. At least it worked for me.

title: I am a long term userof 1password
text: I am a long term userof 1password.  Started with 1 password standalone, navigated through icloud, Dropbox backups and multi device usage.  First 5 years were very productive. Then came the subscription and electron app etc.. I prolonged my move to subscription by couple of years. Meanwhile suffering when browser plugins stopped working.   Finally I decided to make a pitch for subscription version especially along with my family.  1 password team was kind and generous to offer a multi year discount,  amazing documentation and support.   So far a great experience with the all new greatest and latest app and plugins.  I am looking forward for ease of use and productivity in the coming years.  Also very excited for the future with passkeys when they become mainstream.  Never the less 1password is the number one tool I recommend to my friends and family. Keep rocking.

title: migrate data from 2 laptops with stand-alone vaults
text: 1Password (1PW) SUPPORT TEAM are ‚ÄòAAA-ROCK STARS‚Äô in helping me feel very ABLE to navigate (‚Äòdifficult to me‚Äô) the migration of data from 2 MacBookPro laptops (2015-old & new) with separate primary stand-alone vaults (v6, used since 2016), to new 1PW account 'family-membership', across multiple devices; first individually via v7, for data-migration purpose, then the upgrade to v8. PREPARATION: The 1PW website, community Q&A‚Äôs  and YouTube‚Äôs were very effective in arming me with the questions I needed to pose to present my scenario to the 1PW-Team.   The ASSISTANCE was SEAMLESS across 4 individuals (factoring 2-days of gaps in my availability to execute the project).  Jaw-dropping-SWEET service in this day and age! Upon our gaining a mutual understanding of my scenario, the process was immediate and thorough. Signing-off: ONE VERY HAPPY CAMPER! ;)

title: Incredible Customers Service from the‚Ä¶
text: Incredible Customer Service from the team at 1Password, and the company as a whole. Seriously, I'm not kidding. I contacted them because I had some issue trying to setup a subscription account. Customer Services noticed that I had bought a full licence back in 2011 when I was still using a Mac and even though I'm now on Linux they offered to trade in my old licence towards a new subscription account with a generous "first 2 years free" in exchange. That is mind blowing! ü§Ø A 12 year old licence and they offered to exchange it! No other company would dream of doing that.  They sent me all the links to setup the account and I got up and running in mere minutes.  And each staff member was super friendly, polite and took the action needed to make it an awesome experience. I've tried other password managers simply because after moving to Linux at the time 1password wasn't available there but now it's available on Linux (as well as literally every other OS out there) I'm SO HAPPY to be using it again.  No other password manager meaures up to the features, design, ease of use and customer service of 1Password. Great company. Great product. Great people.

title: Lost 1 password account after  upgraded iphone 12 to ios 16.1.1
text: I upgraded my iphone 12 to ios 16.1.1. A few minutes later, I no longer had access to my 200+ passwords on my 1passowrd7 app. After trying a variety of fixes with no success and spending some time on community chat rooms, I sent an email request to 1password, expecting that the request would go into some bottomless pit. It did not. Within 10 minutes, Jason K in Client Support sent me a response and asked a series of questions, which I responded to. Shortly thereafter, I received a detailed set of instructions from Jason on how to get my 1password 7 account operational - and how to migrate over to 8. My access has been restored. Candidly, we're not at plug and play - and I'm going to take a breather before I try to upgrade to 1password 8. But Jason's responsiveness and  professionalism should be applauded. Thank you.

title: The people were great! Their email system seemed a little shaky.
text: My reps were highly responsive and friendly, and promptly got me what I needed with no fuss. The human part of the system worked great. The reason this review isn't 5 stars is probably a technical issue. I initially emailed them about an issue with my account and received no response. It was only days later that I got a note saying they were following up because they had apparently gotten no response *from me.* Included in the message chain was a previous email that I was supposed to have replied to, but that I had never received. I checked my GMail history, spam folder...nothing. The first I had ever seen of their initial response was in this follow-up. So apparently their system registered this email as sent, but it wasn't. Having set up email-sending IT infrastructure myself, I know it's not trivial. Maybe their tech team could take a look at this. For reference, I've (most recently) been using Amazon SES and haven't had an issue that we know of.

title: 1Password v.1 user, about to give up on 8
text: I've been using 1Password since 2010/2011 if not before.  1Password8 is now the most convoluted thing I've seen and, I had no ability to migrate (I tried..) my 75 passwords from 1Password7 to 8.  8 wanted to migrate a 'stale' database of my data, a problem I was having in version 7.  I chose to bite the bullet and just hand enter my data to version 8 via the website which, at the time, seemed like a good idea. How many time am I going to have to enter the key onto the website 1Password account just to see if I can get the app on my phone to work properly?  And on iPhone, I cannot scroll through the list, just "pin" recently viewed, recently created.. etc.. You want to know a cruel irony?  I cannot post this review because I cannot get to my passwords on 1Password8 (passwords updated) without entering the passkey.   I don't know how.. but I recovered it.  Now I'll need to wade hours through how to use this package that I'm paying a monthly subscription service fee to use.    If you buy into this, save the key (verify it) and get the emergency kit.. which I still have not figured out yet.

title: Highly recommended

text: Finally took the plunge on upgrading from an old perpetual license. Truly impeccable! Very impressed. Product/service great too of course.

title: Amazing Customer Support
text: The prompt responses and the wording of the messages from 1Password Support made me feel as if I was actually talking to a human being instead of an automated reply system, which makes the communication so much easier and helpful. Every question was replied to in a timely manner - even though different time zones between myself and 1PS - and with proper tone and attention to detail to make sure the customer gets the wording and meaning of the reply given.

title: I decided to upgrade from a personal‚Ä¶
text: I decided to upgrade from a personal account to a family account. I was a little concerned that my original individual subscription was through the Apple Store and whether I could migrate to the family account subscription which is directly from 1Password. I sent an email message inquiring about the change and Melanie A responded immediately.  She then walked me through the process and ensured I had done everything right to move my subscription.  I was already impressed with the technical capabilities of 1Password, but Melanie A showed that the company also has great support personnel working to serve your customers.  Couldn't be happier with the experience.

title: E-mail is the only way to contact them
text: You better hope it works without the need for support. You absolutely cannot communicate with them any way other than via e-mail. When I've done that, instead of answers, they've only emailed me back with more questions. I don't have time to bat emails back and forth at the rate of one reply/response per day or two for something that could be resolved in one phone conversation.

title: Amazing assistance with a billing revision request
text: Ionas, Zach and Morgan were absolutely kind and proactive while assisting me with my issue, experience on par with all of 1Password' points of contact. I am a happy 1Password user and I couldn't recommend it enough.

title: Reliable
text: The team persisted to find the solution and replied within at least a day per contact.

title: Fast and accommodating support
text: 1Password support was extremely accommodating and responsive in addressing a recent issue I had regarding billing (I accidentally registered for a US-based account instead of a Canadian one). They provided me with specific step by step directions on how to resolve the issue, create a Canadian-based account, and migrate my data over from my US account. In addition, they credited me for the full amount I was overcharged. The whole process was completely in a couple days, and would have gone even faster if I was quicker to respond (they were never the bottleneck).

title: Fast & clear support
text: Support team replied within minutes of my request. Info was clear, helpful and just what I requested. Impressed

text: Brilliant. The very best in the field. Everything is just perfect.

title: 1Password's Support Team is there to help
text: I am an individual user of 1Password, and have been for several years. I possess no enhanced computer skills, so I faced the update to 1Password 8 with some trepidation. I was able to contact the Support Team at 1Password for their assistance to guide me through the  upgrade process. Their advice, albeit via email, was timely, accurate, and easy for me to understand, which made implementation much smoother.

title: Outstanding service and communication‚Ä¶
text: Outstanding service and communication from support.  I have been using 1Password since 2014 and have never been disappointed. Recently I had a problem with my new MacBook Air M2 and my iPhone 13 to install the new versions. Knowing that I live in Belgium (Bruges) I was surprised to see a swift response. The support team helped me all the way to upgrade to the new subscription based version 7 and 8. Look, always prepared to pay as long as the supplier stands by, which they did. Great job and thank you, I am up and running again.

title: Excellent Support, Great User Interface, Many Features
text: I have been researching several password managers to consider switching to. With this, I have been posing many questions to each vendor's support team. From the various support teams I have contacted, my experience with the 1Password support team from October 30 to November 9 has been the best for a few reasons: 1. The replies I got made it clear the 1Password support team read and understood my questions, and replied accordingly. For the other vendors I have contacted, I often have to repeat the question a few different ways to sometimes get a useful response. 2. The 1Password support team is knowledgeable and offers good information. For the other vendors, I didn't feel they had a good/deep understanding of their software and hence couldn't provide quality answers. 3. The 1Password support team is empathetic and genuinely seems to care. I also find the 1Password UI to be the best of the password managers I've looked at, and I appreciate that they offer and continue to invest in a desktop application (since some no longer offer one, or no longer offer new features in it).  There are a few features that are not directly available in 1Password but they have workarounds and solutions for that ended up working better for me (digital inheritance is an example), and there is still one major feature I am waiting on before I consider switching over since I'm very used to it from my existing password manager (the auto submit feature). But once that becomes available, I plan to switch over.

title: Excellent and prompt tech support as‚Ä¶

title: My issue was finally resolved
text: My issue was finally resolved, but it took several days of back and forth emails. I don't know if the support person worked nights or what the hours were, but I always had to wait until the next day to get a reply to my messages.

title: Quality all around
text: 1Password isn‚Äôt cheap but I can‚Äôt find any replacement that fits my needs like 1Password does. It is the small things like being able to create a new login when using AutoFill or that 1Password syncs every time you open AutoFill. And the design is clean and user-friendly. The support is great too, one of the best I have experienced.

title: Support team responded very quickly
text: Support team responded very quickly, and helped me with my issue. Thanks to them, I got my student discount before my upcoming renewal.

title: Fast, straightforward and professional.
text: It was not even five minutes after I wrote my support question, Tej from 1Password helped me and explained the matter in a straightforward and helpful manner.

title: Responsive
text: Responsive. Positive. Helpful. Polite.  I would suggest following Donald Miller's advice (Business Made Simple), and make your support replies and docs as easy as 1-2-3. That is, support docs that are in 3 easy steps (even though you might have more than one step in a step) are psychologically easier to accept.  When I saw all the detailed support information on troubleshooting, I kind of threw my hands up and said, "I don't want to do that! What a pain! I'm busy. 1Password is mission critical, and I have to stop my mission to take a long time to fix it?!" Point is "make it seem simple!"  3 steps!

title: Best Customer Support
text: 1Password has provided a wonderful experience for someone starting to use a password manager.  Knowing how important it is for passwords to be secure, 1Password provides all the bells and whistles needed to safeguard my identity.  The learning tools, videos, and tutorials are very good.  But I've been mostly thrilled with the customer support team!  When they say email support is available 24/7, they mean it. The emails are friendly, thorough, and very helpful.  Best customer support I've ever experienced!

title: I downloaded version 8 of IPassword to‚Ä¶
text: I downloaded version 8 of IPassword to my eight year old MacBook Pro and the app stopped functioning.  It became simply a place to store my passwords. I had used early versions of 1Password  successfully. I decided to try your support via email.  This type of support is difficult for me because follow-up questions are not really possible.  For example, when I am instructed to do something about an extension, I really did not understand what extensions really were.  It also turns  out that there can be both Safari and Chrome extensions., and I'm sure others as well.  Instructions often resulted in me consulting Google for various definitions. The result was a fairly lengthy process of email exchanges between Josh and me.  I have to think he was becoming as frustrated with the experience as was I. However. Josh did not quit, so I decided I wouldn't quit as long as he would put up with me.   In the end, with Josh's help, I was able to push enough of the right buttons to Uninstall version 8 (not easy) and successfully download version 7.  Once I got the extensions right, the app began working as it should. So thanks to Josh and your customer service for the help, it was great.   However I think the developers need to take stock of the problems with version 8 of 1Password. Don Riggs

title: Disaster Software
text: I am no fool and computer literate however even though I have a top of the range iMac this software has eaten up 10 full days trying to make it work. In Safari it just doesn't work and the extension is rated as 2 Stars.  I would rate it Zero. It seems to work 100% of the time on Firefox   95% of the time on Chrome.   80% of the time on Androids. Pretty pathetic really for software in 2022.  If this was intended to save me time and improve my security it has had the complete opposite effect.  Once you turn on a password manager you have to turn off the browser autofills (makes sense) however you are now completely reliant on 1password to do what it says on the tin.  When it doesn't you are left with complex passwords that you have no chance of typing in. This software has destroyed my sanity, the support is zero, no chat, no telephone just email 12 to 24 hour responses your 14 day trial soon gets used up and your headache tablets as well. I can only surmise the 5 star reviews are coming from users of Firefox unfortunately I use Safari and Chrome. I am only hoping all traces of this unfortunate episode experience can be removed from my iMac and I can get back to normal. UPDATE following this review I was contacted by 1password and provided my contact details, following that I was contacted at 730am on Sunday by their expert on browsers and gave all the information that they requested.  I am very impressed with the speed of their response and on a Sunday. Its Monday night now and no feedback yet but I am hopeful, Updates to follow

title: A Model of Customer Service
text: You never know what you are going to get when you reach out to a company for support. Frankly, I never expect much (other than expecting to be frustrated or disappointed). title: Not a fan of version 8--Less efficient than V7
text: Not a fan of version 8--filtering isn't as efficient as the older versions. You type a few characters and it still shows all the entries in the main window while a small pop-up window shows partial results and you have to open the pop-up window to see useful results. It's better to just filter what's in the main window. You also have to login to each account separately, each time, rather than having the possibility of a master sign-on. I could use the same password for each account, but that defeats the purpose.

title: Have someone who already has this set up help you
text: This is what happens when you have someone in the company write your documentation. Never did find any documentation for first time users. The part that I did find for Android installation did not remotely match what I got from the Play store. This should not be anywhere near this difficult. The managers of development, and documentation should both be fired, along with their mutual boss. There is no excuse for releasing a product without matching documentation for first time users. Uninstalling and waiting for the twelve days before I get the email asking me if I want to cancel. Yes I do.

title: Wow, Wow, Wow, Support!
text: Wow, Wow, Wow, Support! We have been using 1Password for years and love it. I wanted to change our plan to 1Password for Families (from two in our household, each using individual plans). I emailed 1Password support and minutes later got an email back from Nate. It seems I was the ONLY person he was supporting because we had an email exchange over a matter of minutes (not waiting hours or days). Nate checked in with me on each step, from account set-up to migration of my old passwords, the add-on of my wife, and her migration of passwords. He provided links to support articles and gave me step-by-step instructions. 1Password has been so easy to use that I've never before contacted support. It almost makes me wish I had a question sooner to know what tremendous support you offer. I never intended on switching password apps, but if I had - knowing any hiccup with 1Password is backed with this support would make me remain a customer.

text: Tommy was very helpful. First I must admit I was stressed to the max because my 1Password app was not working. Finally the fix was to delete the data file and let the program reset itself....brilliant.   First off I was impatient and Tommy kept his cool.... no worries.   Tommy is a great team member for your company.... I appreciate his support.... A+ on the review.... or if numerical is preferred, 10 out of 10 or 5 stars.... Heck, just give him a raise and be done with it. Ciao.... Thanks for listening.

title: Upgrading Made Easy
text: I was unable to move my standalone 1password7 from my old laptop to my new laptop.  After connecting with customer service, the explained why I needed 1password8 and they offered me three free years to upgrade to the new version.  It was a good deal so I accepted and upgraded.  I really like the app and would have been disappointed had I not been able to continue using.  Migrating the data over was simple.

title: I have been struggling to get my‚Ä¶
text: I have been struggling to get my account logged in since we had a lock out. I submitted a request and through email communication we were able to resolve the issue. Thanks again for working with me to get this resolved.

title: Fantastic service
text: Fantastic service, everyone I spoke to was kind, polite and solved my issue straight away.  I couldn‚Äôt recommend them enough!

title: Solid customer support!
text: I was having problems entering my (small, regional) bank's website using 1Password.  I reached out to 1Password's support team and was pleased to get a response in a few days (quite good, given the realistic limitations of live support staffing).  Josh D. was super helpful in gathering the information that would be needed by the developers in a forthcoming 1Password update.  Great customer service!

title: An indispensable tool
text: When I started using Macs many years ago, 1password was my first app purchase. It makes life so much easier, and allows me to use very strong passwords. I also appreciate the secure notes, bank and software license storage, and identities. And since it works with my other Apple devices seamlessly (and even Window), it makes it easy to be productive and secure. Definitely among the best apps out there.

title: I needed help to upgrade my 1Password‚Ä¶
text: I needed help to upgrade my 1Password Individual Account purchased through the Apple App Store to a Family Account... Elly, from 1Password Customer Support quickly responded to my email that I sent to 1Password Customer Support and immediately helped me establish the Family account and I was on my way to extending the product to my family members!  Thanks Elly!

title: Very nice and kind people
text: Date of experience:   September 29, 2022

title: Superb
text: Superb, rapid responsiveness. Answers were complete and clear.  Assisted me through upgrading to Family and consolidating a large number of items.

title: Great, effective support
text: Getting locked out of our password manager is one of our worst nightmares these days, and it happened to me recently as I changed laptops. I had to reach out to 1password support through Twitter, and received immediate response. Ensuring that everything was kept secure and without accessing any of my data, the team of 1password was able to support me and help me "remember" my lost password and recover my account in a simple process. I have always had a great experience with 1password, and the support team raises up to the standards of the tool.  Thank you.

title: Probably the best password manager!
text: Probably the best password manager at the moment, I feel super safe and the costumer care is just excellent (fast and responsive) Watchtower monitor your "data" around the internet and the app works also as a authenticator-app, all-in-one, the complete package! If only privacy.com would bring their services outside U.S. would be a 11/10! Anyway I would definitely reccomend!

title: Support with account re-creation
text: During last several days I have decided to recreate my 1Password.eu account that I have previously deleted after cca 3 months for personal reasons. As I came back to 1Password, which I consider not only among the safest password managers but also the best UI and UX on Windows and iOs (and I am talking about v8), I have tried to contact the support team so that I didn't have to pay again for the account (I had payed the yearly subscription). During our e-mail conversation regrading the issue, the only thing that was a bit strange was having each e-mail signed by another member of the support team - however the result exceeded my expectations and I can continue using 1Password for another year without paying again. For me, this combo of a great software which I trust with my most important data and a support with high level of politness (and results) is hard to find nowadays.

title: Quick, Educated, and Professional Customer Service!
text: The first correspondence didn't meet my need and appeared to be a robot response. Out of frustration, I almost dropped the whole reaching out to CS because of that and it took me saying that my question was not answered so that I could then enjoy a human experience.  Once I was communicating with 1Password reps, I was astonished at how quickly I was getting responses and how helpful they were. I wasn't left to keep communicating with a rep whose shift may have ended but someone else picked up where the last left off.  My profession is in customer experience and the 1Password team nailed it on the head with regard to meeting my needs in a quick, educated, and professional manner. My customer service experience made me want to stick with 1Password even though similar offerings are less expensive. While I do wish it were a little less cost annually, ;-) thanks for the help and excellent service!!

title: Zero Support
text: We are a growing startup with five employees, and 1Password will not offer support until you reach 21 employees. Instead, you are referred to knowledge bases that do not answer questions around issues outside of the ordinary course of installation and setup. I've spent ten hours trying to properly configure these accounts and continue having issues. I do not recommend 1Password for businesses with less than 21 employees.
