title: The resulting experience was excellent!
text: The resulting experience was excellent! I asked a question in the 1Password community group and eventually was asked to to send my question over to get a Support ticket assigned. Bitbot (virtual assistant) quickly assigned a ticket number and hours later received an email from a human :-).  My situation involved getting data on 1Password 6.1 on an old iPad over to 1Password 7 on my MacBookPro. Both Chris Jackson and then Errol Lowe were professional and helpful to an extent as they assessed the situation and gave me links to read for iCloud and Dropbox assistance. They didn't know that I was almost ready to give up and manually type 300+ passwords into 1Password 7. Laura Rooke responded and took over my ticket. What a blessing! She too was professional, but additionally had more knowledge about 1Password 6 on an iPad and gave me step by step instructions, answered all my questions (I was scared to do anything that might destroy the password data), assuring me I wouldn't lose the data, and went beyond the scoop of the ticket. The result, I have all the password data in the latest version of 1Password 7 on my MacBookPro and my old iPad has been updated to 1Password 7. I've used and loved the 1Password application for 9+ years and am thrilled with my first interaction with the technical support.

title: I‚Äôve been using 1Password for years and‚Ä¶
text: I‚Äôve been using 1Password for years and they‚Äôve continuously shown their dedication to security and privacy. Despite the amount of competition in the password manager space, I‚Äôll continue using and recommending 1Password to friends and family.

title: Secure, trustworthy, easy to use, and easy on the eyes too!
text: I've been using 1Password for several years, on Macs, Windows, iOS, Android, and Linux. I initially bought a subscription through iTunes, but when my credit card expired I was glad to have an opportunity to switch to paying 1Password directly. I don't often buy software, preferring to use free, open-source alternatives, but here I feel it's worth it for the peace of mind and ease of use. 1) It's secure. I save all kinds of important and sensitive information in my 1Password vaults, not just passwords. Documents, ID, banking information, and so on. I trust 1Password because they are very clear about the security technology they employ and how to use it. They use plain English and consistent terms to make sure I can understand how to keep my data safe. Thanks to consistently transparent communication, and independent audits of their software, 1Password have earned my trust and kept it.  2) It's reliable. I've changed computers, phones and operating systems so many times over the years; I've moved house and even moved countries, but I've never had to worry that I'd lose my passwords and important information, because I trust that I can log in to 1Password from wherever I am, on a new machine, and it'll all still be there. 3) It looks good! I can also trust that I can find what I'm looking for quickly and easily no matter what platform I'm on - they've gone to great lengths to make their apps and website design really clear and consistent. I'd even go so far as to say it looks pretty! It's one of the few apps I could say I enjoy using, just because of the way it looks. It feels satisfying. 4) It's easy to use I'm sure a huge amount of work has gone into this behind the scenes, but it's actually so easy to use it's hard to describe. I don't even really have to think about it. I click the icon, enter my password (the only one I have to remember!), and everything is just there. My data is organised for me, but I can tag it too if I want. When I'm on a website I've logged into before, if I saved it in 1Password is ready with my details, even if I've cleared my cookies and browser history, even if it was on a different device! When I'm making an account or signing in for the first time, 1Password is ready to suggest a secure, original password that I'll never have to remember, because it'll then save it automatically, with my email address or username, in my vault. When I'm shopping online, I never have to go get my wallet or trust a website with saving my credit card information, because 1Password knows all my cards and with one click it fills out all the details. And this experience is exactly the same on Android, Windows, Mac, iPhone, Chrome, Firefox... I can't stress this enough, it's ridiculously simple and easy to use. 5) Extra features that are actually useful My favourite extra feature is Watchtower, where it keeps track of vulnerable passwords that are weak or insecure, reused across multiple sites, or most importantly, those that have been compromised by security breaches at companies that have been hacked. I feel this is a really useful and underrated feature, because now I don't have to worry about my passwords getting stolen - as soon as they're compromised, I'm notified and I can change them! Other features that seem really useful but I haven't had much chance to use yet, include multiple vaults, family or company accounts, and secure sharing - for example when your guest needs the wifi password, now you can have a long, secure password without inconveniencing them, by sharing it straight to their phone! Lastly, great customer service! Quick, friendly and polite. Backups and passwords are two places where I'll choose carefully and spend money on software. 1Password have earned my money and my trust, and kept it.

title: Switching from 1Password Standalone to 1Password Account
text: After years of using 1Password Standalone I switched to 1Password Account. The older members of my family one by one got to a point where they needed more and more of my help using 1Password, most frequently due to Dropbox synchronization problems between iOS devices and MacOS laptops. Worse yet, in one case, one member got so frustrated with these problems that they had completely stopped using 1Password and reverted to a small set of very poor passwords. After switching to a Single User 1Password Account I was impressed how much easier password management became and I convinced myself that a Family Plan would not only fix synchronization problems but also get everyone in my family to use 1Password consistently. This review has two parts: my experience of switching from Standalone to Account (which was *not* smooth) and my experience with 1Password Support (which was excellent). Switching from Standalone to Single User Account was very easy -- but then went frighteningly wrong. I have a number of macOS and iOS devices and started with my newest macOS laptop. I followed all instructions except I stored the Emergency Kit in my personal 1Password vault. Then I closed 1Password, took a break, and when I tried to log back into the 1Password app, my old master password did not work anymore! And I had not memorized or jotted down the new Account password. I quickly realized that I had misunderstood a key fact: the 1Password Account password *replaces* the old master password! My wrongly assumed that my old master password would be preserved and that the Account password would only be used for synchronization between devices. This is the model of using 1Password with DropBox: there is the 1Password master password and there is the DropBox account password.  Feedback #1 for 1Password Staff: Please include prominent warnings in your documentation that migrating an app from Standalone to Account will *replace* the old master password with the Account password and that storing the Emergency Kit within the migrated 1Password therefore defeats the Kit's purpose. Luckily I had not yet converted the 1Password apps on all of my iOS devices! Feedback #2 for 1Password Staff: While it's great that one can migrate 1Password apps in a matter of seconds using QR codes, please build into the instructions a step that test whether a user can actually log back into the app that is already migrated before proceeding to migrating all apps. So with the outstanding help of 1Password Support, I was able to delete the 1Password Account, create a new 1Password Account, properly remember the new Account password, migrate my 1Password apps on my iOS devices to the new account, reset the 1Password data on my macOS laptop, and connect it to the new 1Password Account. Because I purchased 1Password Standalone licenses, Support made sure that benefits from that carried over to the new Account (since I had to wipe the older account).  The email exchange was over the course of three days -- which was not the fastest. But given the stakes, I didn't mind. Especially because of the high quality step-by-step instructions and associated explanations of what these instructions were intended to accomplish.  Feedback #3 for 1Password Staff: Your support is excellent. This is the reason why I have been a paying 1Password user for many years.

text: I've used 1Password for 5 years or so and love being able to easily use unique, complex passwords for all of my logins. A few of my family members, who have continued to use the same passwords for all of their logins, recently had those passwords appear in leaks so I jumped at the chance to convince them to use 1Password while they were changing all of their logins. I migrated my previous 1Password account to a Family version and got them onboard with a more secure digital life. I can also finally easily update our shared passwords for streaming apps and smart home technology to more secure passwords, now that they can copy/paste those passwords from our shared vault.

text: When it works, it is a convenient app, and when it doesn't, it is one more pain in the ass. I don't know why it works sometimes but not all the time, so I suppose it's because the developer keeps "enhancing" it with new features. Don't waste your time reading the gobbledygook on the "Help" pages ‚Äî you get the usual combination of overly technical jargon and a "community blog" which, I was told by an employee, "The 1Password community forum is completely separate from your 1Password account - for this reason you'll need to register for an account on the forum."

text: Great experience with the Support! They call themselves "lifeguards" and indeed, they are. It reconfirms my decision to work with 1Password, even if they are not the cheapest, but with the support of this quality, it makes the difference. Thanks folks, you helped me a lot!

title: Quick and helpful response to a problem of my doing
text: Working in finance and administering the financial affairs of multiple clients, I am required to maintain literally scores of sensitive passwords which require updating on a regular basis. 1Password has been my saviour. Unfortunately, this year I was locked out of 1Password for no other reason than I mislaid my master password ( yep - incredible amiss on my part - I tend to use facial recognition to access my account so had forgotten my password after many months ). Not being able to access my passwords was incredibly stressful. Fortunately the team client service team ( in particular; Muhammad Hameed) was very quick to respond to my queries and calm me down ). Muhammad was able to assist me in opening a new 1Password account ( I was even offered a 50% discount for 3 years ) and migrate my existing password data from an another Apple device for which I have only fingerprint access to my previous account, to the new account. The response times of Muhammad and his colleagues were quick and the responses and instructions were detailed, yet easy to follow with helpful links. I am used to dealing with clients face to face - so was very impressed with 1Passwords client service in dealing with a complete stranger. Much appreciated

title: Vault question answered
text: After deciding to no longer use Dropbox, I was afraid to delete the vault that I had residing there. I contacted support to make sure that my vault now lived on 1Password.com. I also wanted to know about backing up that vault. My fear of deleting the Dropbox vault was alleviated with the answer to my question. I appreciate the fast response to my inquiry. I truly LOVE 1Password and COULD NOT live without it. I have it on all my devices and I so love the facial rec feature. I have a different, long password for every online account I have. I love the ease of logging in when activating AppleTVs and the like! Keep up the good work! Thanks so much!

It went flawlessly, and I have lost nothing. 1Password provides first-rate customer service...truly above and beyond.

text: I have been using this software for years, ever since it was bundled with some Mac software for a few dollars. I was then forced to upgrade with a paid version for around ‚Ç¨ 15 a few years ago. Now I find out that the Agilebits gentlemen have converted to a monthly / yearly subscription model. OMG, are we talking of Adobe's Creative Cloud here? It seems to me a disproportionate cost for features offered (and I assume development costs), a demonstration of pure greed by AgileBits. Sooner or later they will make my perpetual license unusable (I already have some functionality limitations) and force me to update. It is time to look elsewhere. Thank you.

text: Many people say that 1Password is a very good software. The software does its sensitive and discreet work almost unnoticed and I have been working with it since 2009. There were difficulties and uncertainties from me in the process. 1Password support did everything for me. The team was fast and very competent, and this was spread over several team members. text: I was clearly led through the process enough said! - I'm now back up and running, same as before - so I'm happy ! I'd set up a personal 1Password account, as part of setting up a new machine, and suddenly had to restart the machine, without having downloaded the recovery kit. With no way to get back into the account (I didn't write the secret key down, thinking I still had some time to get to that). I thus had to delete and recreate my account - which was a straightforward and pleasant enough experience :) Thank you!

title: I only have to remember 1Password...
text: And yeah, it's a pretty elaborate password, but it's only ONE password. Everything is locked away behind a wall that nobody but you has the key to - as long as you don't share that key! Don't ask the fine folks at 1Password to "reset" your password or give you a hint - they can't do it! You are the only controller for this Vault.

title: Market leader
text: I chose to sign up for 1Password because all of my favorite tech podcasters personally use 1Password even when occasionally advertising for the competition. I previously used native password managers from the biggest tech companies, but as someone who works cross-platform, a third party solution seemed right. There's still some room for improvement with the app and website UI, and some interactions with websites are wonky, but overall I think this is a good solution. And for the price, there's a lot of extra features which help justify the expense.

text: strong response and actions.   Overall, the process took too many steps and was not well explained on website and in execution.   I understand that is in part to protect passwords but I almost didn't continue to use b/c it too much to understand how to delete and restart my account.

title: Extraordinary
text: I started using 1Password 2 years ago and quickly found many reasons to pay for free after 1 month. Extraordinary support because they were able to answer and explain all my doubts in a short time. The negligible cost, given that we are talking (on a private account) of 38 euros PER YEAR. I think that such a low amount for such an important and delicate service has to be paid. Their integrations with many devices and operating systems and continuous updates. Their site with all the explanations on how 1password works, how it treats data that only you can access and how it keeps your passwords safe (considering I have around 400 passwords at the moment). And finally the ease of use, both from the web and from installable applications. I can't imagine not having my 1Password vault.

title: The only password manager I will ever use.
text: I have been using 1Password since version 1. I have stuck with it even when others like LastPass came into the market because 1Password was always more feature packed and I really liked all the refinements they have added over the years. I was not a huge fan of the switch to monthly subscription, but I guess I understand that this is necessary to keep innovating. And I certainly would HATE it if it went away!. It is true,  I decided to skip it for a few years, but given that when you pay for a license outright the program is hobbled and some features are missing compared to the subscription, I decided to go ahead and give it a try. I am not sure if I prefer it over the older model, or if I will even benefit from what the subscription offers over purchasing a regular license. However, 1Password has improved, year after year, version after version, offering new features and more security with every update. So it stands to reason that with the help of the other subscribers, we will help 1 Password keep improving.   I am not a power user. In fact, I‚Äôm pretty sure there are many features of this program I either don‚Äôt know how to use, or I am entirely unaware of. But the ones I do use are stellar. And they are the reason why I keep using it.

title: I switched to this from Dashlane and am very glad I did.
text: I switched to this from Dashlane and won't look back.  I am very pleased.  I like so many things about 1Password: the different types of items you can save - especially "secure notes", the ability to link items such as a login to one or more secure notes, the ability to share vaults with a family member, and much more.  Most of all, I like having a PC app instead of having to use the web app.  Dashlane lost me when they announced they were retiring their PC App.

title: Top Notch Support
text: Timely and concise responses to my inquiry from staff who demonstrated empathy and concern. I love 1Password and am grateful for the excellent support!

title: Convenient way to keep track of‚Ä¶

title: Top Class Customer Service - Brilliant!  Thanks.
text: After many years as a 1Password user I decided to lash out and buy a family membership.  It's a slightly long and tedious story, but an early misstep resulted in me getting tangled up with multiple vaults and irritating problems which meant it was a bit of shambles for me and the family.  After several years of putting up with this sub-optimal arrangement, I finally reached out for help from the 1P team. They have been fantastic. Really responsive, helpful and patient.  It's taken weeks - all on me (work demands etc.) - but whenever I reengaged, the 1P team were back on it straight away with no 'catch-up' required.  It's now sorted and working exactly as it should.   So thanks 1P team - you've been excellent and generated serious goodwill with me!

title: I have found 1Password over the years‚Ä¶
text: I have found 1Password over the years to be very helpful. I tried other Password Safes in the early years but when I switched to 1Password I found it easier and more intuitive to use. No complaints.

title: 1PASSWORD SUPPORTERS WORLD CLASS

Stay Safe.

title: I was confused and 1Password found a simple, easy, hassle-free fix
text: I was confused because not all my logins were showing up in my account, even though I just had one email associated with 1Password. The 1Password folks were able to quickly identify that I actually did have 2 accounts under 1 email, which was why not all my logins were showing up. After 1 quick verification of my identity, they came up with a simple solution that required very few clicks, time or hassle on my end. And now it's all fixed! Really great experience. Thanks!

title: This may be the worst app I have ever‚Ä¶
text: This may be the worst app I have ever used in my life.  I absolutely, positively CANNOT log in to my account on my windows machine.  I have the 'secret key' but it just won't accept it. Trying to get my family online with this kludge of a software product, has been a multiple support contact nightmare.   Downloaded the app itself on Windows (gave up on trying to sign in with a browser), It auto fills the sign in address as ###.com, whereas my data sheet has it as ###.ca  No way to change it. Nowhere does it specify how to get it.   WHY DOES THIS APP NOT WORK!!!!!!! This is the most frustrated I have been with a piece of software in decades.  It just keeps on ...ALMOST working...but NOT. Absolutely horrible experience.

title: They took care of it so well, as if it were their own problems .
text: I used 1Password since many years without any problem. In this time i had some questions for my several  devices and I always get help  within 24 hours. Many many thanks in the name Password team for Mark-Shane Scale,Chris Jackson, Muhammad Hameed and all other team members. title: Excellent Support Team - Personable and Communicative
text: My experience with the support team at 1Password was amazing. I was assisted by Corinne, Intan, and Mark-Shane. They helped me out with an inquiry I had regarding promotional offers and were able to resolve it with me in a quick, personable, and communicative manner. In one instance that they didn't respond in 24 hours, they replied with an apology and provided an explanation for their delay. In short, they felt like ACTUAL humans, with actual responses, unlike other companies that often use template messages. Overall, a very surprising and pleasant experience!

title: I was locked out of my migrated 1Password subscription account
text: I made a mistake while signing up for my 1Password subscription. I already had a standalone version.  But hadn't read the entire web page, and failed to understand that the webpage login would ALSO be the 1Password (subscription supported app) master password. Saved the subscription password to my (standalone) 1Password... Migrated, and then could no longer open my 1password account because the previous master password would no longer work.  And the password I needed was INSIDE the (now locked) version of 1Password. Really, my bad.  The 1Password support staff were extremely patient, encouraging, very clear, and THOROUGH.  With their help, my problem was resolved. I was very impressed.

title: Awesome Password Manager
text: This is a great password manager and works wonderfully on Windows 10 and Linux. I would highly recommend it to anyone!

title: Solving Extension Problem in Safari Blocking Use
text: Solving my problem was unique as it involved discovering whether the issue was in 1Password software or the recently released Apple OS Monterey. The support I received from !Password was exceptional and covered multiple reciprodal emails and screen shots. Alvin L. stayed with me all the way into evening hours and together we uncovered a "bug" in Monterey and made the necessary correction. Apple didn't get involved as it is third party software. Apple should be made aware and perhaps 1Password should take the lead as the problem effects the operation of their software.

title: Personalized and high quality attention.
text: It all started because I wanted to start using 1password premium. I have been using 1password for almost a decade, the problem was that I had 3 1Password accounts associated with the same email (familiar, 2 individual) as a result of that I had 2 other accounts created that I never used, in addition the main account had the vault synchronized with iCloud. It was quite difficult to understand what was happening from the beginning. After a few weeks of support they helped me migrate all my accounts to 1password (the iCloud vault to 1password), delete the ones I was not using, cancel the appstore subscription and start it with them all very well explained. The problem was definitely solved and my data did not suffer any damage or loss. I definitely love 1Password and I will continue to use it for many more years. They have behaved very well throughout the course of my case and that is worth thanking and recognizing the great work and patience behind it.

The authentication code saver made it easier as I did not have to use a separate duo authentication app. 1Password customer service also applied the 50% off student discount for me after I had the trial so I am really appreciative of it. I find 1Password something that‚Äôs essential to my life making it much easier to manage among all the other hectic things in life.

text: Highly recommend the 1Password Team Having been a long term 1Password user I took the plunge and switched to the subscription model. title: Excellent customer/technical support
text: I experienced major problems when I tried to join the early update to 1Password 8 for Mac. I consider myself pretty savvy when it comes to troubleshooting issues with software. To no avail, I spent several hours trying to migrate my 1Password 7 vaults and installing 1Password 8.  I contacted 1Password support for help. I was connected to Dave W. who led me step by step through, first the diagnosis of my problem, and then the solution. I was extremely impressed by the personalized guidance I received. This was perhaps the best customer/technical support experience I‚Äôve ever had. Thanks to his determination to help me I have 1Password 8 up and running smoothly.

title: Thank you 1Password team
text: As a longtime user of the 1Password standalone license (OSX/iOS, since 2013) I, like many other customers, clung stubbornly for years to the product I had paid full price for and refused to upgrade to the subscription based 1Password service.  Over time my needs changed, and it made sense to upgrade to a subscription model product for my password management, mainly to be able to share certain passwords and for onboarding family members, and to a lesser extent to be able to depend on a supported product rather than an outdated and unsupported version.  The 1Password support team responded promptly to my inquiry about promotions for old customers and immediately offered an attractive deal - I didn't need to provide any evidence to support my claim, although they may already have that data from Apple. It was a pleasant experience communicating them and I will most likely continue using 1Password after my subscription becomes full price. It's a small price to pay for managing hundreds of unique strong passwords, and their team gives confidence that they will continue to offer great support well into the future.

title: Most confusing

text: Love that it works seamlessly on the apple platform. Appreciate that is so reliable and dependable.

title: 1Password gives me peace of mind.
text: 1Password is the first and only password manager that I have tried.  I chose it after reading a few reviews and YouTube videos.  The NY Times review (Wirecutter) was most persuasive.  Anyway, my needs are perhaps a bit more complicated than most.  I use multiple platforms (a Windows desktop, an Android phone, and an Apple mini-iPad) and I had trouble getting 1Password to work across all three.  OK, I'm a "boomer", I'll admit it.  So after a few days of obstinate toiling, I finally contacted 1Password's support team.  They quickly cleared up a few misconceptions.  All is now working fine.  Go figure.  It seems like you can teach an old dog new tricks.  Now my 50 passwords are all strong and safe, and I need to only remember one of them.  Thumbs up!

title: Setup support
text: Contacted support about an issue I had migrating a stand-alone instance to a subscription family account. The email support was exceptional and extremely timely, even considering there were a few different support staff involved as I clarified and provided more details. The self run diagnostics tools really are brilliant and so easy to use and send on output. My issue ended up being a mixup in entering my new online password and then the original vault password sequence to migrate across. Really recommend engaging with support and the product itself is top tier.

title: Paying Problem
text: I had a problem paying for my 1Password subscription renewal. When paying on the Internet, my credit card has to be confirmed by a second factor, in this case with my mobile phone. Since 1Password wanted to charge my credit card "normally", this confirmation query did not come. The payment failed. I then described my problem to 1Password support. The support employee Tej left no stone unturned to help me solve my problem. From the first moment I received answers that did not come from a computer that wanted to get rid of me and sent me standard answers that were not meaningful. 1Password replied to my first email in a professional and solution-oriented manner with a very short response time. The first attempts to solve the problem also failed, but at no point was 1Password a problem. Ultimately, Tej found a way that solved my problem to the maximum satisfaction. Thank you for your commitment Tej. In my opinion, both the 1Password product and the support are great. 5 stars from me. Guido Mueller

title: An excellent app and a great support
text: When I was going to start the subscription after the trial period, I got some problems. It turned out, however, that within an hour or so, I had received a response from support. Had to ask supplementary questions and just as quickly each time the answers came. An excellent app and great support what more could you ask for?

text: Not only is 1Password a wonderful app, especially in this day and age when internet security is a constant worry, but the support is superb too. I cannot recommend both the app and the support crew enough!

text: Very happy with it, logging in is insanely fast! Support is very fast at awnsering, too.

title: The best password and notes secure app

text: Works on all my devices, can share across my entire family, tells me when my passwords may have been breached, looks pretty nice, what's not to love? Oh and they also have an interesting weekly podcast

title: Janrae, and Alex Singer
text: First Janrae answered me and asked me for some basic info, in an effective manner, by asking me yes/no questions. Then, using the info obtained by Janrae, Alex Singer wrote me.  He explained the problem I was having, clearly and in detail and very politely.  Also, he was conscientious in going ahead to provide the answer to my problem.  He specified the steps I needed to follow to resolve the problem.  I did follow those steps, and that fixed my problem perfectly.  Alex provided just about the best tech support I've ever had.

title: I recently upgraded to a new Macbook‚Ä¶
text: I recently upgraded to a new Macbook and needed support in transferring vaults. 1Password team was so prompt in replying, and provided clear, concise, tailored feedback and instructions. I was up and running with no issues in no time. I'm a long time customer and fan, and this support experience reinforced my already glowing perception of this company. Oh, and along the way, there were very thoughtful and guided me to very secure best practices, and was always very patient with my questions I had on the process. I have and will continue to recommend 1Password to family and friends.

title: Unmatched support experience for a great product
text: The support from Kester and team were fantastic, A+. Aside from a slight miscommunication due to some missing conversation history, I really appreciate the depth and personalization provided in the support--truly unmatched. Thank you for going above and beyond to set everything right with my account!

title: I¬¥ve had 1Password for a couple of‚Ä¶
text: I¬¥ve had 1Password for a couple of years and finally I made an upgrade! It¬¥s much better and easyer to handle now. The support from the team are fantastic.

title: Early Adopter
text: I was an early adopter of 1password. They saved me from the tyranny of a family spreadsheet for five people that was driving me nuts. I never looked back or at any other company. 1password just always works so seamlessly. This is a service that I wanted to subscribe to and support even though I got in with an early license.

title: 1Password is Insurance for the Digital World.
text: I had a little bit of trouble migrating from my older versions of 1Password, and the customer service people could not have been more helpful setting it up. They replied to my first message within minutes, and talked me through a few tricky problems that I encountered. I've used 1Password for years - it's easy to manage across all devices, simple to use, and secure. Highly recommended on all counts.

title: I‚Äôve been a long time user of 1P
text: I‚Äôve been a long time user of 1P, but always the standalone edition. I had never subscribed to their service, thinking it wasn‚Äôt necessary. That all changed when I needed assistance with several issues. Subscribing was very cost efficient and I had really GREAT SERVICE from Laura Rooke. We had communicated all day, even late into the evening. She made sure that I was on the correct track with all my devices. This employee deserves some serious recognition. Kudos to all the staff. Proudly Canadian Michael Krys

title: Life saving app
text: Date of experience:   November 18, 2021

title: The most easy to use
text: The most easy to use, intuitive password manager that integrates extremely well with browser. So from saving logins to pull up logins is a breeze within the browsers. It also supports 2FA and secret questions and answers.

title: I have been using 1P for a few years‚Ä¶
text: I have been using 1P for a few years now.  The software is great and support is terrific.  I rarely have support questions, but when I wanted to run 1P on an older Mac, the good folks at 1P helped me make that happen.  Thanks!

title: Complete, safe and very easy to use
text: Very complete yet easy to use password manager. Although they work with a subscription fee, it's well worth it. Recurring income also ensures that they can keep the standards high, which is very important since they keep your secrets safe. Having also used many other password managers for professional purposes, I haven't found the same ease of use in other systems. In the end that makes the big difference if people are going to use it properly; ease of use. No one is going to jump hoops to get a password, they'll get it from their post-it note if it isn't easy enough.

title: Great app
text: Great app, works like a charm in every device even in those less mainstream like a Linux computer. I strongly recommend it.

title: Really helpful support team
text: Date of experience:   November 18, 2021

title: 1Pass is fraught with bugs....Version 7‚Ä¶
text: 1Pass is fraught with bugs....Version 7 will not download or install on Mac Monterrey.....Constantly will not update new passwords across multiple platforms...not designed to work with legacy Mac operating systems....I have 9 Macs with different OS and 1PASS fails on most of them .

title: I want to like this software product.
text: I want to like this software product. However, I need help at every step.  Things work and then they don't.  Each device and each Browser I use and each way I automatically access a site (eye, finger, manual entry)_ requires a different and non-obvious step. The Support Team has been responsive but they don't understand how frustrating this product is or how many steps in advance of their instructions are required. I paid for Family Sharing and that has been a series of heartaches as now both of us can't manage to make it work. If I could just buy insurance to cover the risk of being hacked, I would do that as this program is so very non-intuitive to me.  I get angry every time I attempt to use it.

title: Support that provides support
text: Support that provides support. Kind, to the point and informative. Always happy to email them when I need help because I know I‚Äôm going to be helped. Keep it up!

title: Great product, Great support üòä
text: Great product, great support at a reasonable price point. Nothing to complain.

title: Excellent customer support
text: Excellent customer support, helpful and knowledgeable with quick replies! Thanks a lot,

text: These guys were excellent - in my time of need (my iPhone was stolen) they helped me recover everything.  Simply brilliant!

title: Excellent Service

title: Great Support!

title: 1Password customer services is outstanding!
text: 1Password have incredible customer service. I reported a very small bug that I encountered thinking it would land in an inbox to be reviewed and that would be the end of it however less than 1 hour later I received a personalised email advising what the problem was and how it could be fixed. Very impressed!

title: Apps come and go
text: Apps come and go, but 1Password has been by my side for many years. It's my trusted sidekick that remembers the stuff I can't remember myself and keeps me safe by alerting me to potential security breaches on the web. Highly recommend it. Not only is the app & subscription definitely worth the money, the support team is fantastic.

title: Poor instructions and interface for setting up password protection
text: The instructions and interface for setting up passwords is one of the worst. I had a difficult time downloading the software.  Good luck trying to get help from a non bot such as a human.

title: Excellent customer service
text: Contacted the customer service team to switch my account for .com to .eu. They guided me through the process and then also gave me a voucher for being a loyal customer. Kaley was an excellent customer service rep.

title: With 1Password 7 installed
text: With 1Password 7 installed, I go to install v8. It says 'Move passwords to a 1password account? They will not be available otherwise'.. Umm. No?  I store my passwords outside of 1password's online interface.  That's intentional.  v8 won't read them any other way? I guess I'm not upgrading :(

title: Just started using the product, but support is top-notch!
text: I just started using the product and had some hiccups with it on my Android phone.  The tech support was on top of it and were top notch.  Trevor, Ben and Melicia had me up and running - if the support is this good, I'm sure the product is going to be great!

title: Best password manager available
text: Best password manager available and great customer support.  Function rich and powerful.  Ultra secure with dual encryption.

title: Forthcoming customer service
text: I approached 1Password support about a licensing question and they helped me with a good custom solution, replied quickly, and solved my issue easily.

title: Simple and powerful app
text: Simple and powerful app. works on all my devices - upgrade from standalone to account setup was extremely simple Quick and friendly customer support

title: Customer Service to Write Home About
text: Until last week I still had old legacy stand-alone 1Password software licenses going back to 2012 for my suite of Apple devices.  Recently I became aware that I had neglected to maintain good practices to ensure proper syncing amongst all my devices.  Panicked at the implications to the integrity of my database, I reached out to 1Password support for help to resolve the issue and restore data integrity.  Through a series of timely emails, they calmly, politely, and patiently guided me through the process of trouble-shooting the problem and then offered me a generous discount to upgrade to a superior solution that would simplify and strengthen the management of my password database. I was given detailed and precise instructions that allowed me to quickly and flawlessly migrate my data to my new 1Password account and restore uniform syncing between all of my devices.  Each person I dealt with on the 1Password team of support specialists provided timely, clear, and concise instructions and solution options.  When it comes to online technical support, my expectations are low and experiences not so good.  This team is on another level, a joy to work with.  Oh, and I‚Äôve used the software for about 9 years now but have had exposure to other password solutions through the workplace.  I can say that, in my experience, 1Password is the easiest to use and to manage and now that I‚Äôm on the subscription model, management has been even further simplified and peace of mind expanded.  A great product, and excellent support.

title: Support was very timely and thorough
text: I just switched from a standalone copy of 1Password to the subscription version. I encountered a couple of problems during the process and support was very timely and thorough.

title: You should use 1Password!
text: We use 1Password to manage all of our passwords, and I love it's ease of use, and the support of the non-profit scene. I don't think we could function as a non-profit society without them.

title: Amazing Customer Service
text: Amazing Customer Service. Amazing App. I've been using the app since about 2012. First time I had to use support for a mess I made. They were super responsive and helpful.

title: 1Password makes managing team access simple and secure.
text: 1Password has given provided our community with the ability to safely and securely manage our passwords and shared credentials. Honestly you don't even realize how many you have until you start tracking them. Teams helps both to manage the access and organize logins. When adding new members to a project it's as simple as adding them to the team. Revoking/updating logins is a breeze, and can happen with little to no disruption to the rest of the team.

title: Extremely happy with the service‚Ä¶
text: Extremely happy with the service provided by this company! Very friendly, fast replies and good service over all!

title: Very friendly and courteous

title: I've loved using 1password from day‚Ä¶
text: I've loved using 1password from day one. Me and my family were one of the early adopters, and have been loyal users for years. 1password does an amazing job at keeping things clear and simple, while providing what I believe is a very secure offering. Keep up the fantastic work!

title: Quick and on point!
text: Quick and on point! Exactly what I needed.

title: Payment Method
text: Had difficulties with my payment method. Received help right away after contacting customer support. Support was very frindly and pro-active in regards to solve my issue. Keep it up!

title: If You‚Äôre Looking For An Easy To Use, Inexpensive Password Vault, This Is For You!
text: I can‚Äôt recommend 1password strongly enough, especially if you‚Äôre looking for an easy to use password vault.  I had the free version for a few years, which I loved, and finally decided to upgrade to the individual paid plan so I could load it on all my electronics.  I had put it off for way too long because I thought the process of transferring my info would be too complicated but WOW.  I made contact with their support staff (Alex was awesome!) and asked my many questions.  The response was so quick and answered all my questions with complete details and links.  As an older person, this convinced me to sign up and after following the directions, I was able to load everything onto 5 devices without any problems!!   Not only is this a great, easy to use product, the Support Staff is truly awesome!!!!

title: I am Still trying to get it to work‚Ä¶
text: I am Still trying to get it to work properly.  I hate that there is no human contact except thru email. No phone, no chat option to get fully covered.  All directions Have been very confusing.  I‚Äôm still hopeful I will get all my passwords in.  But it is oh so frustrating when I am somewhere and have to call up an old password‚Ä¶and it doesn‚Äôt have it in 1Password and I‚Äôm stuck! Can‚Äôt go back Can‚Äôt go forward. No access!

title: Awesome customer support
text: Awesome customer support! I got a quick, helpful and super nice response to my inquiry. They solved my problem in no time. Highly recommend 1Password not to mention that it is an awesome product!

text: I encountered a problem with my Apple subscription not being shown in my 1Password account. The Support Team was very quick, helpful and gave me simple instructions on what to do to solve the problem. Thank you very much!

text: Excellent customer support. The product is excellent, and the team constantly improves it. The customer support is Great. Both times I have contacted them, it was a pleasurable experience. They give clear instructions, are very friendly and eager to help.

text: I've used 1Password since 2010 - have occasionally looked at other options but always decide to stay for the level of security and ease of use. Great customer service - peace of mind - and password safety - can't beat that!

text: I have been a long time customer, recently upgraded to a new version. Found a better deal with discount elsewhere, so I emailed them and they sorted me out with the same deal!

title: Great Product and Support
text: I chose 1Password as my password manager and have been extremely satisfied with both the product and support.  The product works wonderfully in both Apple and Windows environments (at the same time), providing peace of mind you hope for when it comes to security. I very recently changed computers from Surface Pro to MacBook Pro and was able, with the help of my Customer Support Representative ("Gem") to both uninstall and and then install the application seamlessly.  While there is only email support (vs. phone), I can assure you, the answers to my inquiries were communicated to me very quickly.  Gem also followed up a few days later to see how it was going...that was great service!! Thank you Gem and 1Password.  A job very well done. Paul W

title: Great support
text: Rapid response, clear advice and satisfactory resolution. Very happy with the support given by the 1Password team

title: I have used 1password for several years‚Ä¶
text: I have used 1password for several years and never had an issue until recent. At no fault of 1Password my account became unusable by not syncing properly. I'm a little old school (some say a lot) and I wasn't thrilled that I couldn't pick up the phone and talk with someone. However, I was pleasantly surprised from the first support request that I submitted. The support team responded immediately with step by step instructions that were direct and easy to follow. My problem was taken care of with two emails. 1Password is NOT replaceable for me! Great job to the support team.

title: Fast response to inquiries
text: Fast response to inquiries, quick answers to questions, friendly people.  Excellent support!

title: Mark
text: Mark, and everyone I've dealt with at 1Password, was extremely knowledgeable, thorough with their instructions, and patient in their explanations.  Support emails are normally something I dread but I found all of Mark's responses easy to read, and simple to follow. It was a painless experience. He got me exactly where I needed to be. Cannot recommend 1Password enough.

title: Always supportive and kind no matter‚Ä¶
text: Always supportive and kind no matter how silly were the question.

title: 1Password ‚Äì excellent password manager with great support
text: I've used 1Password for quite a few years now for generating and storing complex random passwords as well as storing all sorts of other private data snippets, synchronized across devices. It seems to get ever more capable as the years pass and I'm probably missing/don't need some of its features. I've rarely needed to call on Support but it's there when needed with comprehensive instructions on how to fix any problems.

title: 1Password is going the extra mile!
text: I contacted the support team as I was unable to sign up for the 1Password membership, within five hours they had responded and solved my issue. Then they noticed I'd purchased a license to use 1Password before and automatically offered me the promotion for existing users that are switching over to the membership, by adding the discount coupon to my account so that I can enjoy a 50% discount for the first three years of my membership. This is customer retention at its finest :-)

title: Really straight-forward support
text: Really straight-forward support, giving me a solution even better than the one I was expecting!

title: Works about half the time when setting‚Ä¶
text: Works about half the time when setting up new accounts.  Often times the secure site works too fast for 1Password and will save the username/password while 1Password doesn't acknowledge the password change (WHICH IT JUST GENERATED!!!) and will not save it.  So, you have a really long, complicated password for a site and have no idea what it is... because 1Password didn't save what it generated and filled in (twice!).  I have had two sites completely shut me out and had to call to unlock them... because 1Password keeps filling in the info, then not saving it.

title: Great App - and Great support
text: I‚Äôve been using 1Password for a while now and it‚Äôs great - especially with the Family set up. Saves hours with the aged relatives!  Had a problem yesterday (first I‚Äôve had) and couldn‚Äôt solve it myself. Contacted support last night, a few emails between us today, sorted. No delays or stupid scripted responses, just considered help based on the facts and a rapid resolution of my problem. Pleased, and grateful there are still companies that have support staff worth the name!

title: Very optimistic from a tech person who's tried them all!
text: I'm new to 1Password, but I love it so far! So much easier to use than LastPass, more easily accessible on the desktop and easier to use in a copy+paste capacity where needed with desktop apps. The best part is being able to have my MFA codes kept right with my logins and accessible anywhere! I don't have to unlock my phone, find the Lastpass Authenticator app, wait for FaceID to connect me, then find the right code in the massive list of them I have (I have a massive list because I used MFA via authenticator code wherever possible as someone who has had identity stolen more than once).

title: Painless support
text: 1PW Support has been both timely and responsive. Multiple people were involved in addressing my needs yet there were NO repeated questions and the answers provided were simple and actionable.  A painless experience.

text: Super quick to respond. I honestly don't know what I would do without 1Password so I decided to add my family to it as well. I had some challenges with the apple subscription but they gave clear responses and we got it solved ASAP. Can't recommend enough.

text: I have 1password installed on 2 PCs in our home.  I had an issue updating to the newest version.  I send a note through their help line and received an automated response almost immediately. title: User interface could use some tweaks ‚Äì
text: I have used 1Password for some years, starting about ver. 4. At some point I needed to upgrade to the subscription model and I think that is where the problem started as I ended up with a couple of vaults and this was causing the browser extension to not show my login passwords. I also found that my various devices were using a variation of the master password, differing in the use or non-use of a capitol letter. In an attempt to bring everything in line for all three devices, phone, tablet and Mac mini, I updated my master password. The browser extension was still not working and that is when I asked for help. During the process of getting everything working it appears that the new master password has been lost and everything has reverted to one of the variations of the original password ‚Äì this isn't a problem as I think all devices are now happy with that password; time will tell as the mobiles are using face ID or fingerprint, we'll see. The curious thing is the disappearance of the newer password ‚Äì was it only associated with the extra vault that I deleted, and not for 1Password as a whole?

title: Quality Product with Top Notch Customer Service
text: I've been using 1Password as a stand alone for years. It has been super user friendly and has gone a long way in keeping my passwords secure and notifying me when there are issues and updates needed. Zero complaints or issues and has given me internet peace of mind. I recently took the plunge and converted to a subscription. Not being the least bit tech savvy I was having difficulty transitioning to the new product. When I reached out to 1Password support, Alex was so patient helping me unwind the mess I created, giving me clear step-by-step instructions and following up to make sure the problem was resolved - seriously, what tech support takes personal responsibility to follow up?!! Needless to say I'm so happy that all my passwords easily sync up on all my devices.  1Password delivers a quality product and maintains amazing customer service as well.

text: I have used 1Password for ages and love it. However, when I contacted 1Password they were incredibly helpful and responsive and gave me the option of which service I wanted to keep and which I wanted to cancel, and refunded me within 24 hours of me letting them know my choice. It could so easily have ended up with an unhappy customer, but their great attitude meant they ended up with a happy and loyal customer...

title: I locked myself out.
text: Not surprisingly, I got locked out and it was my fault.  I didn't save the emergency kit either.  Support was excellent in their communication and more importantly specific instructions on what I needed to do to get back in. title: Reliable
text: I recently helped a friend whose account got hacked, and I decided to up my cyber security. I did some research on password managers, how reliable they are, who is the most trusted in the industry. 1Password came at the top most of the times, and when the National Press Club in DC recommended it for its members, I decided this was it.  It's easy to use, I feel it is the safest available, and I love that it has many helpful tutorials on cyber security. I am also pleasantly impressed that they thought of journalists (the ones under fire right now from a lot of political directions) and offer promotional accounts for them.

title: 1Password - the best of the best.
text: 1Password is the best password manager out there. They recently implemented an authenticator within your own account, so google authenticator is no longer needed! I've wanted this for so long, thank you! Security and privacy are their two top priorities. I've read about how they secure their users' login information: There is literally 1 person on this planet that can access the information, and thats you. Their designing is clean and simple, and the overall experience within the apps and 1password software is easy to understand for the everyday use. Though there is this one feature I discussed with one of the 1password staff: Whenever my primary e-mail address is changed, i would like 1password to tell my 1password app, and it would send out an e-mail to all the websites requesting an e-mail change and then change the e-mail address in lets say 200 entries, simply just so i wouldn't have to do this manually. I had to switch e-mail provider due to too much spam, and had to change the e-mail address on each website manually. The feature above would've made all of that alot easier. If you made it this far, have a great day.

title: I‚Äôve been using 1Password for a long long time‚Ä¶
text: I‚Äôve been using 1Password for as long as I‚Äôve had an Apple device (I have several now) and that for a long, long time. It has been a lifesaver (as well as a password saver) by letting me keep complicated, hopefully unbreakable  passwords for all my important sites. Especially financial. It‚Äôs convenient to only have to remember one master password and you have access to the hundreds of passwords you may use on a daily basis without having to remember them all.  Other benefits include keeping credit card info handy without having to drag your cards out of your wallet every time you want to buy something, secure notes, identities, bank accounts, databases and even software licenses. The program is truly a one stop memory shop. It‚Äôs hard remembering all these things and 1Password saves time and hair. LOL  This is one app I highly recommend and think it‚Äôs worth every penny which isn‚Äôt much per year in the grand scheme of things. Give it a try, and I‚Äôm sure you‚Äôll wonder how you ever lived without it.

title: I've been a 1Password user for 10 years‚Ä¶
text: I've been a 1Password user for 10 years or so, and lived through some very fundamental changes in how the data is maintained.   When I switched recently to the subscription version, I found two separate Vaults and was very confused about the difference and why one was not being kept up to date.   1 Password support through email explained the issue and walked me through the solution so that now, my MacBook and IOS devices are all referencing the same Primary vault, are synced and show the latest data additions and changes.  I was petrified that I would somehow lose the 750 stored items in making the adjustments, but all turned out well, no unwelcome surprises, and all is backed up as well.  Thank you!

title: Remember where you put your emergency kit! You could need it!
text: I recently purchased a new laptop and had a meltdown as I put my thinking cap on and figured out how to switch 1Password from one laptop to another. title: Feedback & my experience
text: I had the pleasure of dealing with Corinne Debnam and Chris Jackson from Customer Support as I moved my standalone licenses to subscription-based. They helped me migrate and applied my 50% discount since I've been a holder of a standalone license since 2013. The switch has been seamless.   I take that opportunity to tip my hat to Dave Teare for founding this great Canadian company and the rest of the team to create and support an outstanding product. As I mentioned, I've been using 1Password since 2013 (version 3 and recently on version 7 before moving to subscription base) and have never been happier.  Thank you for the great product and service. More importantly, thank you for the company culture you seem to maintain. It is evident even from a distance!

title: Very prompt and helpful support
text: I had recently bought a new laptop and was having trouble activating my 1Password account. After failing to solve it with the FAQ's, I emailed Customer Support and Melicia was responsive and succinct. She sent me a short list of questions and then a diagnostic to run which revealed the source of the problem. 100% solved.

title: One of the biggest problems in‚Ä¶
text: One of the biggest problems in companies trying to always "upsell" their customers with products they may not need.  I had originally tried the family plan and decided that it wasn't for me.  When it came time to renew I was offered an incentive credit to keep my business with 1Password.  When I explained that I like the 1Password product but didn't need the family plan, Josephine, my customer support teammate, helped me through converting to a single user account and also moved the credit over for being a loyal customer.  That speaks volumes to me about the company's climate for customer service satisfaction over just getting another dollar of profit--at my expense.  This is an important factor in who I do my business with and who I will recommend to others. I appreciate the good product, multitude of IOS and PC features, and the excellent customer-focused service! Thanks and my renewal for another year should speak louder than my words.  -Dan N.

title: Upgrading from apple license to family made easy through AgileBits superb support
text: I love 1Password as an individual user. Recently I decided to enlist my family and to upgrade to the family plan. As it turns out if you purchase the individual license through Apple there is no self managed path to upgrade. I had to contact support. Not only were they responsive, they answered all my questions before I even asked them. Basically you have to cancel your individual membership but since you usually do that with some days left in your last month paid, you can‚Äôt directly upgrade from the website as the option is not available (this could be fixed but I would rather have AgileBits deliver some new feature then fix a one time issue). Instead support must detach the account from Apple, give you a trial, credited you with the prorated amount left on your last month and then you get the option to sign up for the family plan! Well they made this process extremely smooth from explaining clearly what needed to happen and what I needed to do, having one real person talk me through the whole thing, patient and responsive (this was done in less than 24h). Thanks Saif and AgileBits. Keep up the good work!

text: We eventually got the problem worked out, but it took several email dialogs with various support folks (over a week or so) to achieve the result. I have no doubt that a brief phone conversation would have solved the problem very quickly, instead of a week of frustration and repetitive emails with multiple players. I could accept that approach if the product was free, but not when I'm paying good money for it.

text: I have used 1 Password for over 15 years and love it.   I can easily generate complicated passwords that I never have to memorize. With one click I can fill both the my user name and unique password for any account.  I only have my self generated, encrypted  password to open 1Password program.  I have never been hacked and feel confident using it with banking and also my investments.  I also keep credit card numbers and account numbers that I can 1 click to order merchandise on line. title: What a great experience, product and support from 1Password
text: What a great experience!  I have used password managers for many years and the level of support has been variable to say the least.  I first started using 1Password as a licence product and have been reluctant to migrate to the subscription model, largely based on concerns about migration of existing passwords, usability and as you would expect cost.  To be honest I don‚Äôt know why I didn‚Äôt move earlier, the migration was an absolute joy less than a minute and all my vaults were migrated, usability is an improvement although it is slightly different especially as I migrated from a single person to the Family plan and cost is actually relatively minor in comparison to the functionality and additional security you are getting. The main thing though was the support and speed of response I got from the 1Password support team (many thanks Darcy W!).  Nothing was too much trouble all questions answered in a timely friendly fashion with lots of additional information and link supplied.  If only all support teams when the extra mile as the 1Password team have done. All in all great product, great support.  I couldn‚Äôt be happier üòÄ

title: 1Password is THE best Password Manager

Their tech support is outstanding. I highly recommend it.

title: Excellent 1Password Support
text: I had several 1passwords accounts and one was not being used.  I wanted add a new iPad to my account and it ask me for the secret code which I did not have.  I contacted support and they responded immediately.  After they reviewed they issue, support suggested that I delete all accounts and start over with a new account.  Support said my vault would not be affected and I could migrate all categories to the new. I was apprehensive at first because I have been using 1password for years with many logins etc, I asked several questions and received immediate feedback assuring me that I would not loose my vault and it would migrate to my new account.  Support sent step-by-step instructions on how to delete and migrate my information.  This assured me that I will have success. I followed their step-by-step directions and was successful.  I deleted the old accounts, created a new account, and migrated my information to the new account.  I easily added my new iPad to my new account.  I now have my Emergency Kit stored in three locations: two cloud and one local location.  These are accessible by all of my devices. 1password support is excellent and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a high quality password manager.

title: So thankful for you guys at 1password team! (long term user)
text: hey, guys just want to express gratitude to you guys and inspire others who may want to try your program.  I have been a 1password user with the original software many years ago, and then recently I upgraded to the new version 1password 7.  Initially, I was a little annoyed for having to pay a yearly fee and a slightly higher fee than other companies, but then upon research, I realized that I was being cheap and unwise because I was actually losing a lot more money by not having this software, here is why...    I am an online business owner and I travel a lot, and as you know there are a few 'bad' apples everywhere, and I have been hacked before.  let me tell you, that is NOT an experience you want to have because it takes so much time and money to be able to clean up the mess and restore harmony.  Having said that it costs alot for a company to develop such a powerful app, encrypted and secure, fast, constantly making updates, and hire and keep an A-player world-class customer support team.  So for me to pay such minimum fees on a yearly basis to keep my passwords safe, my business running and money flowing in is a no brainer! It is one of those things I use every single day! (like my toothbrush!)  Thanks team! keep rocking :)

title: Forcing a subscription model
text: I've used 1Password for Mac and iOS since 2015 and have paid for the standalone licence and paid to upgrade to v7 when it was released.  The product itself has served me well, but no thanks to the developer/publisher, AgileBits, who'd made it very difficult to find the way to purchase the standalone licence over the years. They've pushed harder and harder to force customers to a ridiculously expense subscription model. Apparently, the next release (v8) will require a monthly subscription, as it'll require moving the storage to their servers, rather than giving you the control. They've also recently updated their iOS app to remove essential functionality around shared sheets, which was integral to ease of retrieval for sites where auto-fill wouldn't work. In effect, rather than deciding to add features to the software to encourage you to pay to upgrade, they've decided to remove features -- including hosting your passwords on your own computer or with the cloud provider of your choice -- to force you on to an expensive subscription model.  Don't subscribe! Doing so simply encourages them to continue making changes to further lock you in to their subscription model. These changes are for their benefit, not yours. Time to move to an alternative, like iCloud Keychain, KeePassXC, or Bitwarden. Edit in response to 1password‚Äôs reply: $3 per month is a ridiculous price to charge for this service. Take a cue from BitWarden, who provide an equivalent service at a fraction of your price. Their premium subscription includes the option to host with them (and actually gives a legitimate reason to host with them ‚Äî emergency access), while also having the option to self-host (leaving it to the customer to decide what‚Äôs best for them based on their circumstances), supports iOS share sheets, and costs $10 per year. *That* ‚Äî not your $36 per year ‚Äî is a reasonable price for a password manager service. Licensing two people for BitWarden is less than 2/3 the cost of licensing one person for 1Password.

text: I‚Äôve been using 1Password for a few years and have always been impressed with the product. It has met, and exceeded, my expectations. I made contact with the 1Password customer service team, outlined the issue and was pleasantly surprised when I was contacted within a few hours - especially as I live in Australia and the support team is (presumably) based several time zones away. I was asked to email them a diagnostic report for each device. This was easy to generate. The feedback came promptly, however the first couple of interactions seemed to go off on a bit of a tangent - but this got back on track again very quickly. The instructions were well expressed by the team and readily understood by me. The syncing problem, related to vaults which had not been correctly setup by me, was resolved once the changes had been implemented. I have awarded 5 stars to my review not just for the excellence of the product itself but, just as importantly, for the quality of support delivered by the customer service team. Well done guys!

title: First Time Password-manager User
text: I was skeptical about using a password manager for my accounts. I've always been comfortable with writing login information down on a piece of paper, but it evidently became too much. Everything about 1Password thus far has been great; it's easy to use, you have a sense that your information is secure, I now don't need to memorize dozens of login information.  Recommendations: I use more than one browser between my Windows computer and my Mac device. When importing my information from these browsers into 1Password, I would end up having several of the same login credentials that would come up when logging into a website. It would be nice if there was a detection system within 1Password that could notice this, notify you that this exists in your account, and offers to delete the duplicate login credentials so that only one remains. Lastly in regards to looks, it would be nice if the layout, color scheme, fonts, etc., were consistent across all platforms - web browser extension, website portal, desktop application, and smartphone application. The desktop application has the most dated appearance to it. The dark mode-like theme in the browser extensions and smartphone app is pleasing to use and has a sleek, modern look to it that is much appreciated. To have this in the web portal and the desktop application would be incredible.  Thanks for reading a lengthy review!

title: Great product and great support !
text: I have been using 1PASSWORD for 6 months now and been very happy with its performance. I had been using LastPass for 2 years and was very unhappy with it, and finally decided to change. Yesterday, i was trying to add an iPad to they system and got to a point where it said i needed to add my 2FA code to proceed. I waited to get the "usual" text but it never came.  I tried a few times and same issue.  I then contacted 1Password support and in 5 minutes they replied and explained that the 6 digit code was from an Authenticator!!  I went there, got the code and was all set !! I suggested to Support that they should have a "note" on that page that reminds customers that the 6 digit code is from an Authenticator and they said that would do that.   What more can i ask ?

title: 1Password has been a valuable service I‚Ä¶
text: 1Password has been a valuable service I depend on in my daily work. I'm a little worried about their transitioning to a different UI in version 8, away from native, coupled with the new browser extension that has lost some niceties (like no longer being able to have the same shortcut as the global one) ... however their UX has been superior to alternatives, and I'm sure it will continue to improve, and be as usable. Subscriptions are a little too expensive compared with their competition. But the superior usability has kept me on 1Password thus far.

title: i find the support from 1pw to be‚Ä¶
text: i find the support from 1pw to be absolutely outstanding. i recently needed help over a number of weeks. the time delay was down to *my* unavailability, not theirs. i cycled through a number of support people without missing a beat, because they were always fully up to speed with the case notes.  and a couple of years ago, same thing (different issue of course). at the time i was gobsmacked by the quality of the support, and the attentiveness to detail and to my own individual situation. i didn't write a review at the time, so i'm doing so now! support is consistently outstanding in my experience.  and overall i think 1pw is a fabulous app.

title: 1Password - the new definition for outstanding customer support and a professional application.
text: I have recently had the pleasure of communicating with and setting up a new system and process for storing and using passwords within our company.  1Password was there at every stage with great technical support, advice and guidance when I had more specific questions that were not available through the normal channels.  Their responses have always been prompt, polite, understanding and detailed.  Exactly what I need when a question is being answered.  Without a doubt I can honestly say they have been the most consistent across their departments for all of the above areas and each individual I corresponded with always made sure I was happy with the outcome.  I have outlined the reason below why I moved to another password application and I don't believe I will regret the decision as there has yet to be any issue that we have not resolved together.  Thank you 1Password, you have made my security, processes and systems a much better and easier place to administer. I have migrated from another password manager which was perfectly capable but the customer support was terrible.  Even though previously I had "Premium" support, I felt like I had no support and was not considered valuable.  My issues were outstanding (some in excess of 6 months!) and any communications that I sent were not read correctly or acted upon accordingly.  I could do nothing and felt worthless to this huge company.  I knew that even my leaving would not phase them and sure enough, when my subscription came for renewal I was given no consideration for my patience and loyalty.  LastPass had let me down in ways that were irredeemable.  After researching extensively, I chose 1Password as its replacement.  I am very glad that I did.

title: The Best of the BEST
text: The Best of the BEST! I love 1Password, it just does everything exactly how I would like it to.  Their support is also top notch and easy to both understand and work with.  I couldn't recommend them more.  The family plan is helping me prepare the next generation of 1Password users!

title: 1Password is an excellent company
text: 1Password is an excellent company. I've been using them for about a year now, and their product is incredible. It's among the most secure ways to store all of your login information for the many sites you use, while also giving you storage to store valuable, confidential documents. Their Mac and iOS apps are among the most beautiful I've used and they're incredibly intuitive. Additionally, their customer service is among the best I've ever experienced, as one of their representatives, Seth Abbott, was able to retroactively apply a student discount for me after I had already signed up for their service. Theirs is the kind of customer service that will make me a happy and loyal customer for a very long time.

text: It is a nice app and I have used it with IOS and OS from Apple many years. ON advice from 1password, I am now not using ICloud but only my 1Password account.  It is probably better, but I actually would have liked to keep everything with one vendor, and not spread it around.

title: Alex Singer and Other 1Password Support Personnel
text: I've contacted 1Password twice for help with the app across three devices. Originally I purchased a license in 2012, before the change to a different service. However, 1Password has honored my original contract and supported me many steps along the way. Most recently, my iPhone 1Password wasn't syncing with my iPad and MacBook Air 1Password. Alex Singer and a colleague of his, who tag teamed and distilled the final steps to take to cure the problem, responded promptly with the friendliness, courtesy, professionalism, and competency I have come to expect from iPassword support personnel. They broke down the steps I needed to take to give them the data they needed to have in order to solve my problem. I was able to follow the steps, which seemed terrifying to a non-technical person as myself, and met with success! Thank you 1Password! You must have an amazing culture to have such competent and helpful and articulate personnel to help customers.

text: I had been having a problem updating 1Password app update for several months. I initially contacted Apple who referred me to 1Password because it was a third party application. I provided the I formation which I thought would be helpful but as it turned out I needed to provide more specifics including screen shots which I did. Dave W. clearly and succinctly provided the directions I needed to resolve the problem with the update not updating. I was very appreciative of the help and guidance provided by Dave. I‚Äôm not. a techie person but the guidance and directions were simple that I could effectively get the update to work. Thank you again 1Password.

title: Reached out to 1 password because the‚Ä¶
text: Reached out to 1 password because the application stopped working on Windows 10, the issue was resolved with ease. They were also able to solve another issue that was outside my original inquiry which was fantastic and just a great overall experience. I always recommend 1Password to friends because of its mix of features, security, and convenience.  Even though I gave 5 Stars there is still room for improvement however as the experience across platforms can vary pretty drastically. Moving forward I hope to see this rectified with a specific area of focus being improvements to the mobile apps. Specifically, adding the ability to generate random passwords like you can on the desktop app.

title: Thank you 1Password!
text: I have to admit learning 1Password was at first difficult.  But once I connected with the 1Password support team, it made the learning faster and I began to see the benefit of this program.  Although I am the type that prefers to speak with someone, emailing the support team is great.  They provided quick responses to my questions and their instructions were clear and easy to understand. Thank you for your help with 1Password.  I truly see the value of having this program in my life.

title: What a fantastic app!!!
text: What a fantastic app!!!  Not only can I store my passwords, but I can also store bank and merchant accounts, and credit cards, and much much more.  Very easy to setup and use--there are many very helpful videos for different features.  The app even reminds you when you are using the same password for different accounts, and will create extremely complicated passwords for your account that you will not have to remember or keep track of because you have One Password to make everything work easily.  The tech support is also fantastic.  5STARS in my book.

title: You know

I am happy with the program and very happy with the assistance I received. Thanks. Steve

text: I recently decided to upgrade from my 1Password 6 standalone version on my Mac and on my IOS devices to 1Password 7.
