Their tireless patience to answer each and every one of my questions in an honest and satisfactory manner was outstanding. The almost immediate support I received on every occasion did not cease until my upgraded 1Password software was successfully installed and working properly again. The 1Password app is one of my most used and favourite apps which I can trust and one that I would find hard to live without. title: Wouldn't be without it.....
text: I have been a 1Password user since 2014, have always found it to be a great product. In particular, I have really liked the fact that all my passwords and other key personal data is located in one central, secure and easily accessible location. Recently my old standalone version (1Password 6) stopped working with the latest Mac OS upgrade. After contacting support, they said that the Big Sur upgrade was causing issues with older versions of the 1Password software, and suggested that I consider moving to 1Password 7 which is a subscription product.  I haven't generally been a big fan of subscription model software, but faced with the option of possibly not having this product, it was a relatively easy decision to get a 1Password membership and set up my various computer, tablet  and phone devices for the new software.  In the end, the migration path was smooth, and I had 1Pasword 7 running quite quickly. Email support from the support team was timely and friendly.  There are a couple of features of the old product that I miss, such as the ability to see all my Favourites from 1Password extension. On the other hand the syncing capability of the new software works much better across all of my devices. It appears that I shall continue to be a happy user of this product for some time to come!

title: I have been a VERY long-time 1password‚Ä¶
text: I have been a VERY long-time 1password user ... and I LOVE the software. Each time I see a new round of reviews, I celebrate the fact that 1password is *always* at the top. And, now, I've had even more experience I want to share. When I needed tech support (with a pretty complicated, specialized issue), I was able to get support in very quick order via email. And that involved multiple messages back-and-forth ... until the issue was resolved. My 1password software is running smoothly on my MacBook Pro, iPads, and iPhone ... without a hitch. And it's thanks to the wonderful 1password support personnel!! Thank you, 1password, for having such a qualified team on hand!!

title: I was struggling with login to my‚Ä¶
text: I was struggling with login to my 1Password account for a week after my phone was reset, but with the support team's help, I was able to access it again. I would like to commend Lydia for the great support she have done and to the rest of the team, THANK YOU!

I wrote to 1Password and they sent me an electronic message to give me areas to try to correct my errors immediately. The suggestions worked! Later that day they sent a response from a live tech who was extremely helpful. They even sent tutorials for other beginner issues.

title: Complicated issue resolved perfectly

title: Security that's worth paying for!
text: 1Password is the first app I install on any new device as it makes setting up everything else with logins a doddle. It's the app I use the most and with good reason, it has all my family's important and sensitive data safely locked away until we need it, including debit and credit cards, identities, passports, drivers licenses, secure notes, logins, passwords, 2FA codes. They're all available quickly and sync across our devices without a fuss, and all essential logins and data are shared with those in the family who need it.

title: Being a complete noob to password‚Ä¶
text: Being a complete noob to password management tools, I took the plunge and opted for 1Password because of the good reviews and easy to manage platform.  Today I lost my Master Password and had to contact the help desk. Extremely happy with how quick the team was and I was ready to go within 30 minutes tops.  The service is no more than a pint of beer for the monthly fee. Well worth it to have peace of mind.

title: Reliable. That's what I need from a Password Manager.
text: I've been happily using the service for over 10 years, and decided to take advantage of a current promotion to move from a licensed copy to the subscription. I had a few questions related to the move, their .eu domain, and family account plan.  Their support proved to be as reliable as the service and I was set in no time.

title: Powerful yet easy to use software
text: Powerful yet easy to use software. Helpful and easy to reach customer service. Very happy since I switched from my previous password manager of the last 3 years. Migrated both personal and company passwords to 1Password, not looking back!

title: While the various functions of the‚Ä¶
text: While the various functions of the program can be confusing‚Ä¶ the customer support is outstanding!

title: Responded to my email in a timely‚Ä¶
text: Responded to my email in a timely manner and easily solved both of my login issues.

title: A must
text: I have been using 1Password for so many years, it is one of the first apps I install in any device, it works flawlessly and the support service is incredibly quick and helpful.

title: A+++
text: It's honestly a little scary to consider what kind of information or personal data can be accessed in a breach/hack - and how that might impact my life *and* my career as a journalist. Really appreciate what the folks at 1Password are doing to keep me safe from harm!

title: Trade in: License to Membership
text: I wanted to convert my 1Password license to membership and the 1Password-Support-Team was very helpful and accommodating. Thanks a lot for this.

title: The best cross-platform password manager with 2FA
text: There have been quite a few large-scale attacks on various digital services lately. Which made me rethink how weak the security for my digital life is, and after trying out various password managers and 2fa systems, settled on 1password. They are cross-platform and very simple and easy to use, but also very secure. I particularly love the integrated 2FA system which lets me set up 2FA on almost all my accounts and easily use it.

title: Garbage support.
text: Garbage support. Non helpful, slow support.  Each response is delayed by 2 days per response.  I am day8, and I am no closer. Their website claims "Unrivaled support Whenever you need it, our global team is here to help. Get free, one-on-one support from the 1Password team."  This is an absolute lie.   Its not one-on-one, I have had 4 agents. The request is simple, but we have to go around in circles with text book copy and paste responses, not addressed the actual issue. DO NOT TRUST THIS COMPANY WITH ALL YOUR PASSWORDS.

title: Great customer support
text: Great customer support. Responsive and helpful.

title: Hi to the best support ,
text: Hi to the best support , a fast and well coordinated support - rarely such a friendly and helpful support. Above all: it was possible to help specifically, which is not common. Once again a big thank you Dietmar Banck Germany

And even when I got busy and couldn't address my actions immediately they came back to help me move forward. I appreciate this tremendously.  Thank you 1password team for sticking with me and being so supportive.  Marianne

title: The 1Password support team was very‚Ä¶Forthcoming & helpful, one of the best support experiences!
text: The 1Password support team was very helpful.  It was one of the best customer support experiences I have had!  They were quick to reply, and very detailed and forthcoming in providing the information and steps needed in order for me to resolve my issue.  I am extremely please, satisfied, and relieved to know I can rely on 1Password support.

title: Great assistance from customer support
text: When I started a couple years ago, I found the app easy to set up and use.  But I recently ran into a problem that seemed to be more about the website than 1Password but I contacted support.  I couldn't figure it out but they did!  I got responses from two different techs to be sure I was fully satisfied.  The suggestions on what to look for were on target.  Everything is fixed and running fine.  The service was top notch.  This is how customer service should work. Thanks, Alex & Trevor!

title: Had my ip address added to a blocklist‚Ä¶
text: Had my ip address added to a blocklist and couldn't access the login page. With the help of Nicolas, Alex, and Melicia, the problem was quickly identified and resolved. On top of that, they helped me identify a chrome extension that I was using that was possibly malicious and has since been removed and replaced with a more trustable one. Their help was very professional and timely. Solid 11/10 customer service!

title: Easy support experience.
text: Quick, prompt response to request to change billing. Highly recommended

title: Alex was able to walk me through the process of converting my existing account to an Eero Secure + sponsored account
text: Alex was able to walk me through the process of converting my 1Password Family account to a sponsored Eero Secure + account in a very simple and straightforward fashion.  Alex made this process smooth and simple.  Much appreciated!!!

title: Swift, clear and super helpful troubleshooting support
text: Thank you so much to Audrey for her swift, clear and super helpful guidance on fixing an issue I was having where I could login to my account on my browser but not on my app. She gave me super clear step by step solutions & clear explanations about why & how they could address the problem.  There was one step where it said to "reset all data" that I was a bit anxious about, especially since I'm not the only person who needs the passwords on this account, but she'd already anticipated that worry and included an explanation for it in her email that it's just resetting the configuration of the app, which quickly settled that fear. It's like she's read my mind! hahah Super impressed with and thankful for her support!

title: Prompt responses and good information
text: I wanted to take advantage of the 50% off for the first 3 years by switching from a license to a subscription. 1Password supported reacted promptly and with excellent information. They even responded to questions on Sunday! The transition went smoothly.

title: Incredible Assistance!
text: I have received help from Melicia in Customer Support.  She was so kind, patient, and helpful!  I had forgotten my password and didn't have a backup set up.  Melicia helped me to set up a new account.  She was very clear that I understood I would lose my information, which really I already had due to not knowing my password.  She checked back in with me to be sure that all was going well.  I could not be more thankful! Stacy

title: Fabulous support on a difficult problem
text: Installed 1PW BETA 8, + browser extensions. Installation was different, I should have started over. The browsers were not in sync with the desktop app and browsesr 1PW was continually locking. Virtually no one else was reporting this but the support team began investigating. I was asked to produce console logs, replace extensions and, even though nothing worked, support continued investigating. It seemed that numerous support personnel were working 24-7 to solve my problem and solve it they did. As someone who used to do technical support for a living I have to say how impressed I am with the personnel , their dedication and their skills, at problem solving and customer support. Every business would benefit from implementing an above and beyond  customer support infrastructure  that is the equivalent to that provided by AgileBits.

title: Great customer service!
text: I'm a new user of 1Password. I‚Äôve used a few other Password Managers in the past, but for one reason or another I haven‚Äôt been happy with them.  I decide to make a change and read a number of reviews. 1Password got very high ratings in all of them, so I decided to give it a try. I had a few questions about subscribing, and I found that they actually read my questions and responded with meaningful answers, not canned responses that didn‚Äôt address my questions, as often happens with computer industry customer service departments.  They‚Äôre knowledgeable, responsive, very pleasant to deal with, and gave me the sense that they genuinely cared about me as a customer, something I don‚Äôt find to be very common these days. They were even kind enough to add a few months to my subscription without me asking for it! I'm just getting started with their software, but if my interaction thus far is any indication, I'm very happy with my choice.

Now everything is working the way it supposed to thanks for the professional and detailed help from 1Password support team. THANKS!!

title: Student Discount Support
text: I am a student and I was searching for a good password manager, after watching a few reviews and reading articles, I decided that I want to use 1Password as my password manager. I send an email to the support team and within a few minutes, I got a response from a human after receiving the automated bot message. The support person was very sweet and seemed like she really wanted to help me out. She also responded very quickly to my emails which is a huge +! I also loved the emoji's in the emails, it gave a colorful touch to the emails. I also asked about other payment methods that could be used for the subscription since 1Password only accepts Credit Card in Europe and I don't have that. She told me the alternatives like switching my account from an EU to a US account and using Giftcards, but I wasn't satisfied with that so she provided another alternative to use IAP purchases (Apple App Store and/or Google Play Store).  But not everything is perfect: I did not get answers to a few questions I asked, which is fine, but it would have been nice to tell me that they are not allowed to give information on my question. I also find that the responses seem very inhuman, there is a lot of copy-paste pre-made answers that don't fully cover my questions and as I said, they just don't feel human-like. The overall experience was great!

title: In my opinion the best password‚Ä¶
text: In my opinion the best password manager. Very extensive functions and easy to use. There is a very friendly and fast service. My inquiries were answered competently in a few minutes. I can absolutely recommend 1Password.

Kudos to Melicia and to you for making good customer service a priority!

title: Was a very long-time user of Lastpass, then Nordpass, now 1Password (not going back to any other)
text: Was a very long-time user of Lastpass, made the switch to Nordpass. Didn't care for some of the "immature" features that were missing. Decided to give 1Password a try. Game changer for me and my family. Being able to simplify some of the OTP (2FA) for my teens made using 2FA 100% easier. Also, just the integration and consistency (no weird placement bugs, odd suggestions, limited list of logins for a single site) made 1Password the polished password management tool we need - actually, REQUIRE. Plus, tech support was very fast to resolve a minor issue. I don't imagine we'll need them too much, but glad to know they're fast, courteous, and ready to resolve issues in a flash.

title: Thing of your Digital Assets
text: 1Password manager is the best tool. And I'm saying this after using Bitwarden, Lastpass, Keepass. I have been using these tools for years. I have finally ended up 1Password for the following reasons 1. Very easy to use 2. Very simple for my family members to use and when they need emergency access to password. 3. Think of digital assets, think in emergency your Bank password, OTP are only know where they are and how to use it 4. Developers of the 1Password know lot more than anyone. Here is an example. I was trying to export from passwords from Bitwarden to LastPass. Bitwarden gives CSV file. It is impossible to do so in LastPass. LastPass is there in other Business for so long, but they simple could not address this simple thing. If do not believe me, try yourself with 1Password. It knows how to solve this problem. In conclusion, Please think of your digital assets. Think of your family, who would need access to these when you are not there. When you put your credentials somewhere, think of Support you might receive. I choose 1Password for the excellent support they provide, and there GUI and approach to Password management is world-class. It is matter 2 dollar per month versus your critical digital assets which gets scattered everywhere. Keep is simple, use 1Password

title: Upgrading to 1Password 7 from a standalone version
text: I needed help to upgrade to the current version.  The email back-and-forth with the support techs was excellent and all issues were solved.  My only complaint is that there is no phone support.  I am sure that the questions the support group helped me with could have been handled in one phone call.  I recommend a service such as Apple support provides via phone calls.  Customer frustration levels would be greatly lowered when the support can happen quickly versus over days or weeks of emails.  One factor I believe is important is that not all computer users are young and tech savvy.  I am a senior citizen and don't always know even the terminology that is used.  I also object to live chats, which my experience with other companies has been that the chats are unnecessarily long and drawn out because of the scripts the support people are required to use.   Otherwise, I am very pleased and look forward to using 1Password well into the future.

title: Extremely good service
text: Extremely good service. Understood my issue and quickly acted on it in a timely and efficient manner. Reached out on a Saturday not expecting to hear back until Monday but ended up receiving a response in an hour. After a few back and forth‚Äôs, all of my issues were resolved.

title: I have used 1 Password since 2014
text: I have used 1 Password since 2014. With the cascade of passwords that I have to use I don't know how I'd manage without it. I recently got a new phone and found that I was having trouble transferring my data. I had been stubbornly hanging on to my old user license, since I only had to pay for it once, not once a year. Ifinally bit the bullet and signed up for an account.  I'm not computer inept, however, I ran into more problems figuring  out how to make the changeover on my two devices. Two wonderful techs,  Mike and Chris, very patiently emailed me through the process. A huge thank you to them. I do wish the company would allow phone assist as I think it would have been so much quicker and easier.  I like what I've seen of the new layout. title: You made me a believer!
text: I was convinced that using a password vault would not work well with my mix of iOS and Windows.  I could not have been more wrong.  1Password does everything it claims with ease.  I created a family account.  My spouse and I each have a private vault plus a shared vault for common accounts like banking.  It took a little time to work through resetting all the weak and reused passwords I had.  Now I have zero reused passwords.  All system generated and I don't have to remember any of them.  Chrome, Edge and phone apps interface to 1Password perfectly.   There are 3 user interfaces.  A Windows App, Browser and Mobile app.  You can do everything you need from any of the three but it takes a little hunt and peck to find all the features in each UX.  Once you export your current passwords from your phone or browser, it makes like a lot easier to deleted them all.  Even after Chrome reported that it was using 1Password, it still had a tendency to popup it's own password.  Once I deleted all Chrome passwords, everything worked perfect. For under $5.00 a month you can protect your entire family.  Get this tool.  You will love it.

text: Dear 1PASSWORD ,  I had a problem with billing, and indeed just figuring out what I might have done to cause the problem. text: The app is great. I'm having a blast, really. But I had a problem where I signed for the annual plan instead of the monthly plan as I wanted. After the trial expired, it charged the annual on my credit card, and I was unable to change to the monthly plan as I wanted. So, I had to communicate to the support via email, wich is often a long, slow process. And I was surprised that the team aswered super fast, my problem was solved quickly and the support stayed in touch with kindness and goodwill. Great app, great support.

title: A very quick response
text: A very quick response, a solution offered which worked.

title: Not the transparent friendly company they portray
text: If you look at all their 5 star reviews you'll see that they were almost all invited to post a review. This should be a huge red flag. My company decided to finally use a password manager. After reading reviews online I decided to give 1Password a shot. I went four days without a response. They claim to offer 24/7 support, but I doubt that. What if we had a technical issue? It was only after I signed up for a trial that someone reached out to me. They were far from helpful. Instead of answering my questions they gave me a generic answer and linked me to a support page. I actually couldn't stop laughing when I saw that they had copied and pasted what was in the support article. I posted on their forums and they admitted they were at fault. A few weeks later I came to post a question, as we are considering using them again and noticed that they had completed deleted my post from their forum. Guess they don't want the general public to see them admitting to being wrong. Thankfully I took a screenshot of the forum posts to send my colleague which I still have. They were also not honest about their pricing. We wanted to be billed monthly for the first four months to make sure 1Password would be a good fit for us. They told us we could only pay annual when they in fact do offer annual billing. Nothing about this company sits well with me. We went with a cheaper competitor, got a demo the same day I sent my email, had someone help us get setup and they even check in with us to see how things are going. That's what you call customer service.

title: 1 Password is terrible

I pay microsoft for an email service that I don't want micromanaged and want to be able to block email spam and 1 Password changed that.

title: i has just the licence (not the‚Ä¶
text: i has just the licence (not the 1password membership) for years, and used the apps on macbooks, iphones and ipad. the family was told to use one of the apps in case of an accident to access the passwords. it suddenly struck me that if my laptop/iphone/ipad were not available to the family in case of any accident, there would be no way for them to access the passwords. i therefore bought an individual licence, and have shared the secret key with the family. this way, they can access the passwords from any browser. wonderful support from the service team to transition from a licence to a membership.

title: Praise for 1Password
text: After a lot of research into Password managers, I started using 1Password a number of years ago and have been delighted with how easy it is to set up and use.  I recently raised a query with the support team and have to say that I was most impressed with their response.  Not only were they most helpful in resolving my problem but they actually pointed out that I had 2 accounts set up - an individual account and a family account, and that I was paying a subscription for both.  I had not realised this.  Not only did the team assist me to delete the individual account but they arranged for a refund of the subscription that I had paid for it.  In today's world this honesty is rare and would like to take this opportunity record my appreciation to the team. I would be extremely happy to recommend 1Password to anyone looking for a Password Manager.

text: The platform is amazing. You are able to securely store your passwords, as well as your OTP's. title: The Best Customer Service
text: One quick note about customer service...they are awesome.  I locked myself out of 1Password and also lost all of my data 151 items.  I worked with customer service for days and they finally got all my data back and up and running smoothly.   Not only were they very professional and knowledgeable but they were so patient with me and never gave up.  I highly recommend 1Password as the best app for saving data but also the very best customer service team I have worked with.

Well done and continue to keep the fire burning brightly, so others shall see your beacon of light and follow! Cheers, Samuel Tay, Singapore

title: Rescue

We shared it on : 2 ipad(s) Pro, 2 iphone(s) 6s, and 1 macbook pro (2 users) ; - but, after installing 1password 7, this didn‚Äôt work anymore ; happily, the 1password support helped me efficiently. Everything does work now. I still have to learn about the new enhancements of 1password 7.

title: Excellent support
text: Been 1Password user for almost 10 years, this product never disappoint me. Finally decided together the paid membership for personal use.  The support is responsive, helpful and they are really friendly. Cannot recommend this product more.  The price is slightly steep considering the conversion rate, but I think it worths the money as it is for your own online security. I just hope that the pricing can be more flexible for existing users.

title: 1Password: Great Password Manager, Bundles with VPN Easily
text: I encountered 1Password a couple years ago while researching password managers. Not knowing their brand or much about their company, I chose to try them out, and was not disappointed. As my knowledge of personal cybersecurity has deepened over time, I now know that 1Password is a reputable company, preferred by many cybersecurity experts, as well as privacy-conscious citizens. I am not an expert in cybersecurity, but I am deeply privacy-conscious, and have gone out of my way to create buffers of personal security for myself.  Recently, I was looking for a VPN and discovered that 1Password is offered as part of a bundle through Pango (HotspotShield, RoboShield, and 1Password) and decided to sign up. I've only had Hotspot Shield installed for 1 day so far, so I can't offer an accurate review, but my existing 1Password account seamlessly integrated with the Pango bundle, and was easy from my end to set up. These folks care about privacy, security, and support.  10/10 would recommend.

title: Excellent customer service attention
text: My problem was solved in the same weekend I requested support. Customer agent Saif was very clear when sharing information and giving instructions, I really appreciate his help. I‚Äôm glad we could solved this issue because I love using 1Password services.

title: Quick and Efficient
text: I recently purchased a Eero Secure+ subscription which came with 1Password.  I had a code to redeem for 1Password but had to contact 1Password via Email for assistance.  I did this on a Sunday (July 4, holiday in the US) and was not expecting a reply for a few days.  Within ~10 minutes, I had a reply from Trace advising what I needed to do.  I was surprised I had a live human response in such a quick manner! Trace was most efficient at fixing my problem! I ended up with a refund and a properly set up 1Password Account.  Thanks So Much For Awesome Support (a rare feature these days!).  :)

text: I don‚Äôt often post reviews but this app has done so much to keep my million logins safe and secure that I had to. And it saves so much of my time. They replied in less than 10 minuetes and the issue was solved immediately for a quite complex query. Similar questions for payments and upgrades often take ages, but this time it was incredibly fast.

title: Amazing software and customer support
text: 1Password is truly a great tool that I think everyone should use, especially in the world we live in today. It works superbly well and the interface and app are the best looking and best designed of all the password managers out there. Everything is easy to setup and their security is top notch. They also have an amazing customer support team if you ever have any issues or need help with something. I had a problem with billing once and they went above and beyond to fix that for me and get me a great deal. It was really good to get some decent support for once compared to most support teams who are far from useful. 10/10 would recommend.

title: Excellent support department (1Password.eu)
text: I've been a long time user of 1Password (since 3.2) . Due to expiration of stand-alone licenses I finally switched to the subscription model with a discount for long-time users. So basically I pay the same amount for 3 years when I used to pay for a stand-alone license.  I've chosen to store my data in the European Union so I chose 1Password.eu  The migration tool to convert old vaults from my stand-alone verison worked great. I also had some contact with the support department about migrating. The reply was fast, friendly and suitable for me.  Since I'm such a long-time user, I'm used to the lay-out of 1Password. Some people don't like the white spaces in the interface, but I'm happy with the lay-out on the mac and ios versions. The only wish I have is an interface in Dutch (language setting) since the on-line version differs in available languages (compared with the Mac and IOS versions).

title: Lost Like a Babe in the Canadian Rockies
text: Oh Canada, oh Canada, setting up is hard to do.  For example: I don‚Äôt understand 1Password relationship with my browsers Safari & Chrome.  Are those passwords stored on the browsers automatically transferred to 1Password or must I manually copy each of them over (ugh!)?  Once I figure out how to transfer  PW‚Äôs should those passwords stored on the browsers be removed for greater security? Have you any idea how I am to get other family members to sign up and embrace 1PW, if I can‚Äôt understand this app? Secret Key is well named for it is a real secret to me.  What does it do and what do I do with it? How much can I trust a company which asks for my review, only to find out they transferred me to another web site called ‚ÄúTrustpilot‚Äù?  What is going on, guys?  I have a stinking, sinking feeling this set-up effort is failing and our brief cross boarder relationship is quickly going south.

title: An Excellent Example of Top-Notch Customer Service
text: Seth was a pleasure to work with.  Some qualities that really stood out were: responded quickly.  Clear provided instructions on what needed to be done to resolve the problem.  While providing directions, he gave me options and explained the outcomes.  Very polite and professional.  An asset to the company and an excellent example of top-notch customer service. Well done Seth and 1password! -Dan

title: 1Password has made me a customer for life
text: I have been a 1Password customer for about two years now, but it is only recently that I have had to seek help from their customer support team, and the experience was so wonderful that I can honestly say I will be a customer of theirs for life.  I made the massive mistake (PLEASE learn from my idiocy!) of not writing down my Master Password and keeping it in a safe location. I found this out when I attempted to log in while wearing a mask, and Face ID did not successfully sign me in so it asked me for the password instead. After several attempts to log in, I contacted customer support for help.  It's a fairly long story from there, but I eventually had to create a new account.  However, the takeaway from this whole thing is that their entire team was responsive, hella supportive, and kind to me.  They walked me through every step of the process from trying to remember my password to transferring my Apple subscription to my new account so I would not have to pay for it a second time.   They were simply wonderful, and I cannot recommend them enough.  If you are considering downloading their products, I assure you you will not regret it!

title: Best support I have ever contacted!
text: I had a question about using Windows Hello to log in to my vault and why it was different than the Mac client.  Dayton answered quickly and with a full explanation as to why the windows and Mac client are different. Instead of just getting a simple response of we will look into it I was given an explanation of how the system works and why the difference is there. I was also reassured that the team are looking for ways that this could be changed later on.  Overall the support was very quick and helpful giving full answers rather than just saying something to get me to go away.  Amazing support. Would definitely contact again if I had any questions or issues.

text: I have nothing but kudos for the Support Team who got back to me on a Saturday and snatched me from the jaws of anxious despair! title: If they can hack our Government and all of the major businesses recently, they can get you. Save the US$5M the NE pipeline had to pay
text: Last year I installed an EERO Mesh system in a few locations. After I started doing some work from home, and banking, and everything else (that gift from the lab which cannot be named), I decided I needed security and protection, not just for me, but my clients and even friends. Certainly after having pour NE corridor hacked and other recent big hacks which cost a fortune and created havoc, I do not understand why everyone does not have significant security. But, this is my experience. I wanted to get the bet protection I could, I read through everything from inert and the like to Wirecutter. It ends up that Bezos can afford to buy the best (All through his Amazon, Ring, EERO, and everything else. EERO has good customer service and also took it upon themselves to leverage out their size and negotiate some good security plans to offer to their customers. The most security is with their EERO Security Plus. The plan has 1Password (1PW), Malwarebytes and Encrypt.me. All excellent. I had previously used 1Password a few years ago on past computers. When I installed it this time I had some issues (not with the plan, but with my installation, both being a tech imbecile and also the past account creating issues). I shot out an email to 1PW to see if the could help. They can and did. They respond immediately and not with boilerplate blurbs or linked to a fat site, they addressed me directly and my issues directly. It took over a period of a day (but that was my fault as it was a work day and I could not respond to them with the speed with which they responded to me). It ended up being quick and easy (it often is when you know what you are doing...that would be them, not me). They had to pass off to several associates, but each responded immediately and had all notes from my prior queries. The CS agents/Tech Support are very quick., very knowledgeable, patient and generous of spirit. text: I am new to 1Password.... after just 2 days I had a need to upgrade to family to share my passwords in the event of my death... As I am a bit paranoid about this stuff, I went and checked the invoices and was very surprised at an amount far higher than expected, but again - it had NOT been billed to my card. I emailed support and they promptly replied and noted that updating a subscription in this way causes confusion in their billing system, and explained to me very clearly what happened. The billing to my card for the upgrade amount was perfect once it was finally charged. I have had 2 occasions already I have had to contact 1Password support, and on both occasions, I have found them polite and very clear with their explanations. I highly recommend them if you are moving from another password tool. A bit of Googling will show you 1Password has NEVER been hacked ... !Password has my support. text: My issue with1Password was that I had vaults on my PC that weren't visible on my iPhone. I wanted data relating to specific family members in different files than mine. I opened a case with 1Password Support and received a response the following day. The information provided in the response was clear, precise and accurate.  It turns out that I needed to create these new vaults on the web interface and NOT on my PC. There were several back and forth email correspondence to get to the final solution .. but each return email was promptly received the next day. This support team is top notch .. very professional. A good product needs good support and 1Password excels in both categories.

text: We had a family account and all went well until we messed with the master password (bringing it in line with a new paradigm), forgot it,  a computer broke and was disposed of and the emergency papers were lost. To their credit the 1Pass staff did all they could presenting me with options. text: 1password was always asking for my master password. I sent an email to the support team and got a reply extremely quickly. It addressed my issue with the exact steps to take.

text: Billing issue. Somehow I had subscribed to the same app through 2 different sources. My error. The Support Team easily discovered the problem, guided me through the steps I needed to take to resolve the problem, and efficiently made the needed changes at their end to prevent double billing in the future. They were knowledgeable, efficient, respectful, and non-judgemental. Love the app and highly value the support team

title: Great Customer service, great website, a great well designed product  that is going to be even better in the coming months .
text: I know there are many people that want a free password manager for a number of reasons and might not look at 1Password. I am however already paying for a Family subscription. I had tested 1Password before but only for a short time and ended up returning to my existing provider Lastpass. One reason was that Lastpass was slightly cheaper and offered a very good free option and I thought that if I ever needed to go back to it, I could use the free version with everything ready to use. However recent changes in Lastpass, some news around that apps tracking, together with the fact that I never quite warmed to the Lastpass design made we want to try a new password manager that I hoped would make other family members  more interested in using it.  However my Lastpass subscription had auto renewed in February and I was stuck with my subscription.  So I was going to test it now or later in the year with view to changing in the new year when my subscription is ending.   I first gave Nordpass a try which has a beautiful design but unfortunately is currently not compatible with Chromebooks. Then I reached out to 1Password about the possibility of having another trial period to test out their product and enquired about any deals. To my delight 1Password gave me 6 MONTH free trial which allowed me to fully migrate my other family members and provided me with the opportunity to continue using it when my other password manger subscription and the 1Password trial period come to an end. It was also easy to pick up with 1Password since my previous account only needed activating and I didn't have to start from scratch. I admit that I have not tested all the different features of both password managers, but would say that based on my experience and numerous reviews  that the features are quite similar. Lastpass uses  of label folder system whereas 1Password uses a vault and label system.  Ultimately I found that 1Password is easy to use and that there are lots of very easy user guides on their website.  Once I was familiar with the interface I found it both more pleasing to the eye and easier to use, especially as a family manager.  I admit that I slightly preferred the Nordpass design, but to my 2nd delight 1Password announced the roll out of a new version which looks stunning and even more functional. I already find that 1Password has superior password saving experience to Lastpass and Nordpass for example. There is an option to reveal your password that including counting of characters. So if you are asked about the your 4th, 7th and 9th character you simply click on large reveal on 1Password and it will have the numbers underneath. Super useful. To me the ease of use and the beautiful design together with obvious foundation of good security and 0 trackers, rich functionality and a great website have made 1Password my preferred choice. This will make it easier for other family members to make more use of a password manager and safe online practices. I really look forward to the new 1Password apps that will come out over the next months.  Ultimately using a password manager is more important than which kind of password manager, and if ease of use and design encourages the use of such a tool its worth spending money on.

title: Great Support
text: My apprecation concerns the fact that the support associate read the whole message and accordingly had a perfect solution.

title: Customer Support is one of the best I've seen
text: I was having some trouble paying for 1password subscription from my bank card. The 1password customer support team were very helpful in helping me out. My card wasn't really working but 1password registered it and to see if it works, I would have to wait the trial period to end, which the team didn't make me do and instead ended the trial on their end to check if my transaction would work, which it didn't. So I didn't have to wait for the trial to end, only to realize that I couldn't pay. I ended up choosing an alternative method to pay which worked. One thing to note is that they were kind enough to restart my trial so I would have some time in figuring out my payment method. I was very surprised by how quick and helpful the 1password customer support is. They don't just have quick responses, but they also have a well-built management portal which helped me out (ending/restarting trial etc). I'm very pleased with 1password app as well as the customer support. I wish them the best :)

Also included was a good explanation as to why 1Password had changed the default to OFF in Universal Clipboard.  Now everything is working as I want it again.  Thanks again to the 1Password team.

title: Superb Tech support when upgrading from  1PW6 to 1PW7
text: I recently upgraded from 1PW6 to 1PW7, but failed to upgrade 3 of my 4 devices.  My laptop was running 1PW7 and its had data migrated from Dropbox to the 1PW site as part of the upgrade.  My iMac, iPhone, and iPad had their 1PW data synced to Dropbox.  Since I seldom used 1PW on the laptop, I eventually had a situation where newly-added 1PW data on the 3 Dropbox devices was unavailable on the laptop running 1PW7.   The tech support at 1PW was superb in helping me to upgrade the iMac to 1PW7, move all the Dropbox data to the 1PW server without duplications or corruptions, and synchronize all 4 devices.   Overall, I'm also pleased with all the features present in 1PW and their support available via email.

title: New to 1Password but not PW Managers
text: I'm new to 1Password but I've used a competing product for several years. I'm very impressed with the software and the support. Before I was even a paying customer, I sent a query to Support and received a detailed response in a matter of hours. Impressive. I spent nearly 40 years in IT with my last position being the Vice President, Operations for a software development company. I think I have a pretty good instinct for good and bad apps. Having watched 1Password evolve over the years and deciding I wanted to change, i did a great deal of analysis before hand. 1Password came out on top for me. While my previous supplier was good, there were a few "undocumented features" that bothered me, the cost was more than I was willing to pay, and support was slow. 1Password has one benefit I think everyone should consider. They are one of the few companies that offers a truly FREE trial period. While you have to provide a credit card, it is only charged once you finish the trial period and you keep the product.  For those of you moving from a competitor, my move was seamless. Follow the guides and you shouldn't have a problem importing your data. Everything came over perfectly for me. From a usability perspective, new users may have an advantage. Coming from a competitor, I was doing some things out of habit. I need to retrain. New users have a clean slate. Three things worked in favour of my 1Passord decision. First, great support, second, pricing, third, ease of transition.

It worked, just as he described. In today's world, good customer service is almost a thing of the past. My experience contacting a technology company with a problem is consistently negative. No response for days and days, canned answers that don't solve my problem, along with poor attitudes. 1Password, your service blew me away. Thank you for your service.

title: Fantastic Customer Support!
text: I have been using a basic password manager for years and need a more sophisticated tool to better manage my information. I have been playing with three different apps during their free trial periods to determine which may better suit my needs. While three I looked at are all fairly similar - I was somewhat frustrated with 1Password as the linking process was unconventional and I was not able to get it to work. Decided to reach out to support to see how responsive it was and was extremely pleased with the quick and accurate response even providing additional suggestions. this enabled me to look a little deeper into one password and had me reach out to support once more as the interface and organization methods are very different from what I am used to. Once again, the response was quick, accurate and offered additional suggestions - all this with a Trial Account - very impressive! This positive Experience with Support has solidified my resolve to become a customer for 1Password going forward - well done - not only a good product but excellent support! Cheers!

title: This software is easy to use and so‚Ä¶
text: This software is easy to use and so helpful. Before adopting this software, we kept lists of passwords and did find ourselves resusing some of them. Within the family, we're able to each have a personal vault and a shared vault with the family common passwords.

title: Great customer service
text: My husband could not logon with his Login information and we kept getting an error message ‚Äú You can NOT add two accounts from the same family or team‚Äù. Customer service especially Alex worked with me and we discovered that the (old) Primary vault had data left behind from our single member ship license.  When we switched to family subscription that data must have left behind.   CS sent me the links how to check my data and steps to make sure no data would be lost.  After verification I got instructions how to reset data.  After that I was able to logon with the correct Logon info from the emergency kit.  Success and all logon now work correctly. Thank You to all technical support members to keep working with me and get me going again üôè

text: As a new subscriber, I was somewhat confused with pricing & American/Canadian subscriptions.  Seth answered all my questions & was so helpful in getting me started. title: Amazing feature rich product
text: Amazing product. Lots of features that other password managers lacks! Since I'm linux user, I love their recently released linux application of their password manager. One of the best features that 1password has is their ablity to scan QR codes for 2fa setup automatically. Reddit community is friendly and have lots of tips and tricks for you, that's where I found that I can put all my document HD pictures together with their text information in 1password and access them anytime! I had only two encounters with their support, but they were supper friendly and security is their number one priority.

title: So far 1Password works very well and‚Ä¶
text: So far 1Password works very well and considerably more smoothly than Lasspass.  One site in particular that was hard for Lastpass was the Washington Post site which 1Password handles smoothly.   Another thing I find superior is support.   1Password has fairly responsive email support which is vastly better than what Lastpass offers.  I also like the many ways 1Password offers to sort and categorize various kinds of information such as passports, medical records etc.

title: 1Password is an Excellent Password Manager and Company
text: I've used the password manager for years now, ever since the version 4 days.  I've always found it to be reliable and well-integrated with my browser.  From my point of view, its single biggest advantage is the ability to use really long, but hard-to-memorize, unique passwords which I can then access from my PC and my smartphone. In addition, their support department has proven to be very helpful.  A recent configuration mistake on my part forced me to recover the accounts for my family, and the support representative steered me in the correct direction, answered my questions, and all in a timely manner.

title: Fast efficient effective service
text: Fast efficient effective service! They gave crisp clear instructions that were easy to follow and fixed my problem the first time. I wish all support areas were this efficient!

title: Run, don't walk, to buy and use 1Password
text: Simply put, 1Password is the one app I would never want to be without. I have used it since 2009 and use it ALL THE TIME...and use it on iOS devices as well. The developers really care about their users and the experiences of their users. They are constantly updating and improving the app. Functionality is like many apps, where there's a lot more to use than many use. Don't hesitate buying and using 1Password for all of your password and secure-data needs.

title: I messed up my trial period!
text: I messed up my trial period because I made a change to my account type.  This caused my trial to end, and then I was charged for the service.  After I emailed the support address, I was contacted in a VERY SHORT amount of time, (maybe 20 minutes), by Timothy Watkins.  Tim not only took care of the issue THAT I CAUSED, he followed up with me after processing my refund and reinstated my trial.  It is good to know that the customer service at 1Password is as good as the product!  I will be a subscriber for as long as passwords are used, so like for as long as I am alive!

title: We are currently migrating our password‚Ä¶
text: We are currently migrating our password protection program from another service to 1 Password due to inadequate customer service assistance after the other company made some service changes. My husband could no longer get his to function on all his devices adequately and, after repeated attempts to correct it, got frustrated enough that he brought up to me about changing our password program. You can imagine that this is akin to going to the DMV - to be avoided at all costs. But when I couldn't get their customer service to assist either, I figured it was time for a change.  I did a lot of research and landed on 1 Password for service, price, and security. However, I screwed up the setup of my account and somehow created a personal account AND a family account, put dozens of passwords into the personal account and then it was frozen before I realized I had 2 separate accounts going on. Another total pain in the butt! however, this time around, the 1 Password team did not disappoint. You all were so helpful, patient, and quick to respond. You helped me move my passwords over (after a few repeated failed attempts) and get the old account deleted! I work at a company where we deal with a lot of customers and I know customer service can be very difficult, especially when it's about security and access. Sometimes, people get frustrated and it takes level-headed calm people to keep things moving and solve problems. Very well done and much appreciated. Thank you so much.

title: 1Password: does what it says, great customer support.
text: I have been using 1Password for several years. My login to some financial websites has been spotty, and I‚Äôd learned to live with it. But I had an idea for a feature which would help, and I suggested it on their website via a form. Customer support emailed me back and worked hard to fix my problem, through several emails back and forth. And their solution, with the current version, works great. I can‚Äôt recommend 1Password highly enough. The software does what it should, and the customer support is great.

title: Clearly reading my emails
text: Clearly reading my emails, gauging my technical expertise very well. Quickly forwarded me to technically skilled support. Took less than 24 hours to fix my issue.

title: I couldn't have asked for worse support‚Ä¶
text: I couldn't have asked for worse support if I tried. First there is no phone or live chat support, so any problem that could be fixed in 15 minutes takes days, or weeks, with very, very slow email responses. Then when I asked about why there was no live support, I received a totally disingenuous answer about how 1password considers this the best option. Resolution of my problem took more than 10 days. Only when Yaron K. started getting involved did I get an honest answer and proper help. While I like the product when it works, a faulty update caused 10 days of grief. I would not recommend 1password to anyone as a result.

title: I received a lot of help
text: I received a lot of help. I am Korean. I understand my poor English well and guide me through without worrying In particular, I made a huge mistake of accidentally deleting the entire account while changing the family account to a single account to link the pango account. Still, I was very calmly guided with the instructions and procedures and was relieved by the message that I will handle it with you until the end. Very good experience  Thank you again

Having used 1Password for work for the past 9 years or so, I'm really happy to continue using your service for my personal password management too!

title: About a year ago 1PW technician Tommy‚Ä¶
text: About a year ago 1PW technician Tommy Hightower helped me with several issues I had with the app. He was terrific, talented, and worked with me diligently to solve my problems. I was so impressed I saved his emails to me in case I ever had a problem again. So when I recognized that I did have an issue with 1PW I contacted him, and he promptly responded. He not only remembered me, but he almost instantaneously sent me detailed instructions that completely solved my problem. I can truly say I have never been more impressed with an individual technician and with the level of problem solving service with any other app. I will continue to recommend 1PW to friends and family, as I have done for years now, but I will do so with even more confidence and enthusiasm than ever before. Thank you again for the exceptional service.

text: I had been a LastPast user, but switched over to 1Password when LastPast started requiring a premium subscription to operate on more than one device. I was impressed by how easy transition was. Once you have two different secret codes, things get complex on all your devices. The support was great in helping me resolve the issue. Their response time was outstanding.

text: I've been a long time user of Lastpass but ever since they changed their free platform to be limited to one device type, I've looked to move elsewhere. 1Password was recommended to me by TheWirecutter and it's much better than Lastpass. title: I've been using 1Password for several‚Ä¶
text: I've been using 1Password for several years, as a member of a shared family account.  I love it.  I don't know how to compare with others, but I'm probably a heavy user, with over 500 different logins in my 1Password.  1Password does a great job in giving us solid periodic updates.  The performance is excellent - things just work.  One of the great benefits is that I can share my master password with a trusted relative - if something happens to me, then they can access all of my accounts in order to manage the estate.  My wife and I share the same account so that we have access to all of our separate as well as shared accounts.  Customer service is great - I had a problem using the Safari extension, and I had the answer from CS within 24 hours.  Highly recommended.

title: My request for assistance in the‚Ä¶
text: My request for assistance in the process of migrating my 1password subscription to eero Secure + program received a quick response. The message detailed very clearly the steps I needed to implement this change. Also included was the invitation further support should I encounter a problem.  I appreciate quick, thorough customer support that is communicated in a precise, easy to understand message. It enhances the 1password experience!

title: Simply the best.
text: Simply the best Password Manager out there. A great product backed by a tremendous customer support team. I had an issue with my subscription and everything has been resolved in less than a day. Above my expectations.

text: Product seems very good so far, and customer support is quick and efficient.

title: 1 Password really deserves 5 stars
text: 1 Password really deserves 5 stars.     I love the security and confidence it gives me in knowing my passwords are safe. And I love how easily it gets me into all my secure website on my mobile device and my laptop. When my 1Password app stopped working due to a hard drive problem, their support team provided brilliant support to get it up and running again.   Thanks for being an amazing game changer, 1Password.

title: I was having issues with syncing my‚Ä¶
text: I was having issues with syncing my multiple devices and with a little help from 1Password support the issue was resolved.  Thanks

title: Master password
text: I unfortunately forgot my master password for 1Password 7. I contacted the support team. All members of the team were extremely helpful and allowed me to re-establish my account from an old version on my computer.  I found the instructions very clear and it was very helpful as I was able to migrate the information stored into the new account.   Definitely worthwhile contacting the team if you have any problems. My advice is not to forget your master password but if you do the team will certainly do their best to help you solve the problem.  Anne

title: Great product
text: Great product, and Great customer service

title: The response time if you have any‚Ä¶
text: The response time if you have any issues is pretty quick. 1Password has worked great for me so far. The response time if you have any issues is pretty quick. The only downside is that there isn't an easy way to migrate the passwords from your iphone/icloud to 1password.

title: Great support from the 1Password team
text: Great support from the 1Password team. They got back to me very quickly with thorough info and solutions.

title: Solid password manager, solid company
text: I have used 1Password for years, and have always found it to be a solid password manager. I've watched the company continually develop the software and build in new features as technology develops. Thus, it's completely compatible with my iPhone and Apple Watch for ease of use. When Teams were developed, I brought 1Password to my company, and was easily able to created different vaults for different teams. Management of users and vaults in Teams is easy. Now as I retired, moving my personal vault back to a personal account was quite simple with the guidance of 1Password support, which I utilized just to be sure I did it correctly. The mechanism built in to 1Password made this process totally simple. I'll continue using 1Password into the future. It's features, and the company behind it, are rock solid and trustworthy. A job well done!

title: Awsome service.
text: Just switched last week from Dashlane to 1Password. I've been very happy. 1Password has a desktop app and a mobile app. The password plug in works great, very fast and accurate. Reached out to customer service,  a human person replied and helped me within 24 hours. Very professional.  Data import was super easy and done within a minute.  Very happy so far. Very user friendly.  Wish I would have switched sooner.   My husband is a IT professional and will be telling all his customers how happy we are with 1Password.

title: I had a question about my subscription.
text: I had a question about my subscription. Everything was perfect as they quickly answer all my questions

title: I had a great experience with the team of 1 Password solving my problem!
text: I had a great experience with the support of 1 Password help desk! They solved my problems immediately and I am so happy that my 1Password runs so well again.  Many thanks from Germany  Rainer

title: Good product and good customer service
text: Been using this service for almost 2 years and i'm really happy with it. Also nice to see that they keep improving it. Going to use it for many more years to come. Also the customer service is really nice. I made a mistake on my end by accidentally upgrading to a family subscription. I contacted them and they quickly replied back to me with the steps on how to revert it back. They even refunded back the additional money I paid for the upgrade. A++ customer service. Effective, quick and friendly.  Can only recommend! <3

title: Great password manager...with customer support to match!!!
text: I have been a 1Password user since version 4. Most recently I have had a standalone license for version 7. I have all Apple devices and have used a free Dropbox account for syncing. Currently, however, the free Dropbox account is limited to three devices, so I decided to to upgrade to a 1Password subscription for the extra features and to be able to sync all my devices in iCloud. I also like the fact that a subscription provides continuing support for the 1Password team, which has provided excellent software and support over the years. When I sent an email to customer support asking some technical questions about the upgrade, I received a quick response with accurate information and an introductory price on the upgrade, which made the upgrade decision even easier. This is par for the course. Although I have only had to use customer support only once or twice over the years, 1Password support never disappoints. The app itself is great. Back in the day, it was one of only a few password managers for Apple devices. Now there are a lot more, but when you read the independent reviews, 1Password still is one of the top recommended managers. I don't think you can go wrong choosing 1Password.

title: Requesting Assistance With 1Password
text: I have been a user for 1Password for about ten years. I obtained the app when it was free since I had heard a lot of good reports about it. Soon thereafter, I downloaded it for my wife and she uses it too. We find the app very helpful. Approximately one month ago, I was looking into updating my 1Password app and noted that after I had inadvertently tried a 10-day free trial version of it. Once the version expired, I could no longer edit or create new passwords in 1Password. So, I reached out to you all and Jason, Jessie, and Joshua all assisted my with kindness in how to rectify my problem, which was resolved. Thank you and great work! Tony

title: Exceptional product support!
text: The product itself is quite good, but for this review I'm giving "5 stars" for the exceptional 1password support team.  Within 30 minutes of me opening a support ticket online, their team had an answer for me -- on a Saturday morning of the long Memorial Day weekend.   Because I was impatient and didn't know how long the response would take, I also posted to the 1password forum on Reddit -- and received a good answer to that within 15 minutes, from someone else on their support team.   So I'm very impressed (and thankful) for the excellent support from this team.  They "explained how things work" when changing the secret key (to recover my fiancee's account) and how to get her going again.  (And again, on a long-weekend Saturday.)  Thanks guys.

title: The BEST password manager and support
text: I've tried all the major password managers and 1Password is hands-down the best. Their support is also excellent ‚Äì responsive, thorough and they have all the answers. Love 1Password!

title: Amazing customer support
text: Thanks to Kaley for untangling the mess I made of my account(s). What I thought was going to be painful and long was handled so easily. What a relief. Thank you so much Kaley and 1Password for making this a breeze

title: Super customer support
text: Super product!  Our whole family shares it.  Yesterday I had trouble signing in to my account on the 1Pass website. (Not the vaults) . Sent an email to customer support. Got a reply within about 2 hours with an easy fix.  All this on Saturday of Memorial Day weekend!!

title: Very prompt response and very clear
text: Very prompt response and very clear.  Thanks for helping me out.

text: I created two accounts by mistake. And I left it there for a year. When I contacted the customer center about it, they responded very quickly, even though it was the weekend. I am very grateful to them.

text: Your instructions are impossible. What is a vault? What do I do once I download? How is it not in my browser? Where can I get help?

text: I've been using 1Password for over 10 years, and I can't imagine my life without it. Hands down, the Apple utility that I use most frequently and makes my life better every single day. Thank you Agilebits for continuing to produce such a great app!

text: I have used 1password for about 4 years now - it's been working amazingly, but I had a small syncing issue I could never be bothered to look into properly... title: 1Password is SO MUCH BETTER than LastPass!
text: I painfully have been a user of LastPass on a Mac for about 2 years with basically no technical support.  I would send an e-mail to them and maybe hear back in several days telling me the same instruction that made no sense.  I always thought I was fairly "techie" but not with LastPass.  I am very grateful to 1Password customer service.  I have e-mailed them quite a few times asking questions about the product on a mac.  They always responded very quickly.  I finally got brave enough to go through the process of setting it up and they would respond to my e-mail questions very quickly.  They were very helpful and I'm so happy I don't have to deal with the other program any longer.

title: Excellent support.
text: Excellent support. Making changes to my account was a little scary, seeing as I use it for everything. They walked me through it all step by step.

title: Really got what I needed via email in‚Ä¶
text: Really got what I needed via email in an effective way.  Very happy to use 1Password and feel more secure that they have a great CS team.

title: Prompt, knowledgeable and personal service
text: This is the second time I've needed to contact 1Password technical support.  The first was promptly and efficiently handled.  I thought the good service might have been an aberration so I withheld judgement. My second experience was equal or better. What impressed me most was how timely they responded not just to the initial question but any followup questions as well.  They answered so promptly that the questions were still fresh in my mind. The written responses are personalized to one's needs.  Not just a link to an answer with a lot of extraneous detail but a specific detailed personalize answer.   Lastly the ability to offer screen shots in a traditional email format helps a good deal.

title: Support response to Billing issue
text: I had a problem with my billing in that I was charged for a plan which I had changed (deleted). Sent an email to support and within 30 minutes got a response asking for additional info. After sending the required invoice, the issue was resolved in less than 10 minutes. Very, very, very good service and very friendly ( I hope I haven't used up all the "very" word).  Thanks again

text: Date of experience:   May 27, 2021

title: The support staff (Nicolas
text: The support staff (Nicolas, Trevor, Alex) was extremely helpful and fixed the issues I had. I'd absolutely recommend them if you need a password manager for relatively cheap.

title: I won't be re-subscribing
text: Changed from using LastPass to 1Password and seriously regretting paying for an annual subscription now. Initial pain was migrating in usernames/passwords from my LastPass. It imported the details ok, but each time you visit a site for the first time using 1Password, you are prompted to select which Logins to use on the site :( Other major bug-bears are it not prompting you to save an updated password when you enter a new one on a saved page (what is the point of the service if it doesn't do this??). Painful also is having to click on the Edge toolbar to login when you use it each day. Why not popup the password prompt when you try to complete a userId/Password field for saved site? Also very poorly thought out implementation of Identities, e.g. DOB is stored in a field called "birth date" - if you try to fill out a form that has a field called "date of birth" nothing auto-completes, so now I have had to save multiple fields with the same value (Birth Date, Date of Birth, DOB etc.). Same for things like Last Name - I've had to save this as "Surname" and "Family Name" also. Watchtower (security report) is not a patch on the equivalent version in LastPass which provides a much more comprehensive set of features, and allows you to auto-update some major services (e.g. Gmail/Yahoo etc.). Very disappointed user - will be switching back once my subscription ends.

title: Helped me understand confusing documentation
text: I have used 1Password for several years, and it has been indispensable in keeping track of my 200+ logins.  In the last few weeks I learned that it can be used for two-factor authentication, which I was trying to establish for the TeamViewer website.  Documentation for the TeamViewer website left me uncertain as how to proceed, so I used 1Password's invitation to use email help.  This was very important, because many 'help' desks refer the user to frequently asked questions, without a means to contact a real person.  The real person at 1Password got back to me quickly and solved my problem right away with clear instructions.  Thank you!

title: Great password manager with first-class Linux support
text: I've used 1Password professionally for years, along with competing commercial and free solutions. 1Password has been seamless, especially in several areas: - They seem to take end-to-end encryption seriously, but support it with minimal annoyance. The emergency recovery kits are a nice touch. - First-class Linux support!! There's no comparable alternative if you're a Linux desktop user. - The free family plans included in 1Password Business are quite useful for building a culture of good security practices among employees - Browser autofill works very well, but the dynamic MFA token autofill is simply magical

title: Big shout out to 1Password support.
text: Big shout out to 1Password support. I signed up a while ago but didn't record the details, and wanted to start using the program. Support quickly helped me through the process to reset my account and now I'm good to go.  Thanks guys!!

title: Billing problem (solved!)
text: I had a billing problem (essentially, I was being double billed because of an annual subscription with 1Password and a monthly subscription through the Apple Store). The 1Password team got back to me within a day, and they gave me very clear instructions for solving the problem. They also issued a generous credit to my account. You could not ask for better support. It's just one more reason to love 1Password.

title: Good for personal use, needs improvement for work
text: Very useful password manager, both on Android and PC with good UX for personal use.  Only one major gripe that is a recurrent pain point, please support sub domain rules like LastPass. Critical when using 1Password for work (eg. Working in a software development team, I have many different logins under same company website domain, for our products, on different environments like staging, testing, production).

title: 1Password linux app support
text: I started using the 1Password Linux app a week ago and had some trouble with the connection between the app and my browser extension. On their forum there was an entry for the problem I was facing, but it did not solve the issue for me. I asked for help on the forum and was not disappointed; within a day I had a reply and over e-mail we figured stuff out. A follow-up issue I faced was solved within days as well, because of the time put in by the support team.  TL;DR: In my experience, the customer support was just great.

I even have my last-will in there as well, which is sad and great at the same time, since in an emergency all that data can be accessed by my close relative very easily. Thank you for this great product and the great support!

text: I recently moved over from LastPass, to 1Password. title: And the winner is... 1Password!
text: After many years using open-source app to manage my passwords, I reached the point where much more features were needed, especially because of a family use and several devices to handle. So I give a try to different applications, and I will choose 1Password to go on with the credentials management. Several readings around gave the proof that 1Password is strong, efficient, secured. User interface is good and features are useful whatever you are with your mobile or your computer: passwords imports, 2FA, sharing items with users, os integrations... I had to talk with the support team because of a little issue, but I got quick answers and my problem got solved. So here we have a serious and strong application, really handy, with a team behind ready to help you. So let's run for 1Password! Eddy

title: Forgotten "Master Password" Recovery
text: On May 9, 2021, I emailed 1Password Support telling them that I had forgotten my Master Password to my 1Password account.  Later that same day, Melicia Hewitt, Customer Support@1Password, replied in an email giving me some suggestions as to how I might be able to remember or recover my Master Password.  With her suggestions, I was able to recover my Master Password on May 16, 2021.  Melicia Hewitt was a life saver for me!!!

title: Duplicate Vaults
text: After 10 years using "1Password"and its many upgrades (including one which created an "Account" on "1P's" own servers), I ended up with 2 Vaults that were not synchronized. After a lengthy discussion with Customer Service on how this occurred and the possible fixes, I was able to move my data to a single Vault accessible by all my devices. At some point, when I have tested all my logins, I will delete the second vault. Customer Service agents (2) were patient, helpful and supportive. Thanks

text: I was having an issue where I got a new phone, but could not link my 1Password account to the new device, because all of my two-factor tokens were locked.  Panic! Since I don't have a twitter account, I sent off an email, praying that someone would get back to me quickly.  And within minutes, Connor emailed me with several options that I could try...and the very first one was exactly what I needed to gain access to my 1Password account on my phone.  I always thought 1Password was an awesome program, but now that I know they have amazing customer service to go along with it...I will be shouting their praises from the rooftops!

text: I had some n00b questions about using yubikey with 1Password.  Support answered all my questions with details, and within 24 hours, something I was not expecting. They were very patient with me, much appreciated.

title: The Best Password Manager Ever
text: I've been using 1Password for several years. This is the best. Their set-up is uniquely secure in that you must have several items of information in order to log into your account. There is a learning curve when you switch from the name of your pet to having all unique passwords, so at first it can seem difficult. It really isn't. It's really just the small amount of extra time it takes to copy and paste things. At least you don't have to manually type in a 24 character long password, and using unique passwords is becoming more and more important these days. I myself have clicked on an email only to regret it. I work with a few elderly people and have taught them how to use 1Pass. It's all too typical that the names of pets and street names seem easier. Simple patience with something new is all it takes and they're safe and sound. I'll add that 1Password's customer service can't be beat. They respond quickly, and if the FAQs don't get you where you need to go they'll give you specific advice. I can't stress enough how much this has helped. Also, the price is right. I don't have a single complaint.

text: 1Password is a very good password manager; however, lately, I have found some updates a little bothersome. The annoying dialogue box always appears when I don't want it to.
